She has worked as a farmer for several years and now, it has returned her about 30,000 Cambodian Riels (KHR). 

This is the third cycle of loan borrowing for Sophy and her partner, and they are asking for 1,000,000 KHR and 500,000 KHR respectively. She has wisely used her past loan with success to upgrade her lifestyle. Sophy is the leader of the loan group, and she will spend her portion of the loan to buy fertilizer for her pineapple plantation, and to pay for the farmland flattening fee. Sophy believes that she can grow her income to triple its previous level.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer for her pineapple plantation, and to pay for the farmland flattening fee

loans.name: Saad

texts.en: Saad is 20 years old. He lives in a sector in Jordan called Wihdat. Saad is currently working as a carpenter, and at the same time studying for a bachelor's degree, majoring in finance. He is in his last year. He is planning to find a better job after his graduation to earn a better income in order to support his family. But because of the financial crisis his family has been facing, he wasn't able to pay for his upcoming semester fees. For this reason, he has applied for this loan.

loans.use: To pay for his upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Egesa's Group

texts.en:
Egesa is a member of the Imara Group in Busia District. He is pictured here in a group of nine One Acre Fund group leader farmers. The group leaders represent a total of 82 individual One Acre Fund farmers who are not pictured here. Egesa has been selected to act as the Kiva group representative and is standing on the right with his hand raised. He and the other farmers represented in this group are each receiving ¼ acre of maize and ¼ acre of sorghum or millet. Each farmer is receiving an average input loan of 5,349 shillings for maize, millet and sorghum cultivation.

Egesa is a reliable member of the community. He is married and has three children. Egesa is 38 years old and has been working as a farmer for the last 15 years to support his family. In addition to this, Egesa is very active in his community and is involved in groups like the men's group, savings group, prayer group and burial committee. He described his harvest last year as not with One Acre Fund. He hopes as a One Acre Fund farmer he is able to join the ranks of One Acre Fund farmers who have doubled their harvest in their first year of the program! 

The 2013 Long Rains season will be Egesa’s first season with One Acre Fund. He joined this year in order to get the best seed prices, get new farming methods, get fertilizer and hybrid seeds, to earn enough to feed his family and send his children to school. As an active member in his community, Egesa has also volunteered his time to be a group leader and Kiva representative because he wants to help more farmers and spread the story about One Acre farmers. He believes that his life will improve as a One Acre Fund farmer. 

Egesa and the Imara Group need a loan to cover the initial costs of purchasing the seeds and fertilizer through One Acre Fund. One Acre Fund will repay the Kiva loan on behalf of the farmers through the profits from the farmers’ harvests. One Acre Fund pre-purchases the seeds and fertilizer when prices are low and passes the cost savings to the farmers. Throughout the planting and harvesting season, One Acre Fund also provides training and support to the farmers as they make payments back to One Acre Fund. With support from One Acre Fund and your loan, these farmers will have a chance at a successful harvest, increased profits and improved lives.

 The field officer is also included in the photo and is standing on the left of the photo.

loans.use: To access to hybrid seed and fertilizer for harvesting maize, millet and sorghum.

loans.name: Rene

texts.es:
Rene de 75 años de edad, es una persona casada convive junto a su esposa, estudio hasta sexto grado.
Rene se levanta a las 5:00 a.m. Junto a su esposa que le apoya en la actividades agrícolas y en el ordeño de las vacas.

Él se dedica  a la agricultura oficio que aprendió de sus padres,  para llegar a la parcela camina 4  Km y trabajan durante la mañana y su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos y en la tarde se dedica a cuidar las vacas que poseen.


	El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar dos vacas que necesita para incrementar la producción de leche para la venta y obtener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Rene is 75 years old. He is married, lives with his wife, and has a sixth grade education.

Rene wakes up at 5:00 A.M. He and his wife help each other with the farming duties and the milking of the cows. Rene learned how to farm from his parents. In order to reach his parcel of land, he must walk four kilometers. His wife takes care of the household chores in the mornings and he looks after the cows in the afternoons.

The loan he is requesting will be used to buy two cows that are needed to increase milk production. He can sell the milk and generate more income.

loans.use: to buy two dairy cows.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy wholesale medicines.

loans.name: Lamia

texts.en: Lamia is 19 years old. She lives with her parents in a sector in Jordan called Mafraq. She is a university student in her first year. Lamia is planning to find a better job after her graduation and earn better income in order to support her family. But because of the financial crisis her family has been facing, she wasn't able to pay for her upcoming semester fees. For this reason, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: To pay for her upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Narine

texts.en:
Narine lives in Shaghat village of Syuniq region. She lives there with her husband, three children and mother-in-law. Narine is a farmer with some years of experience. The farm that she runs includes calves, cows, sheep and chickens, as well as a plot of arable land where she cultivates emmer wheat and wheat.

Narine's husband sells the gathered agricultural products in the local market and earns income for family.

The main source of family income comes from agriculture, so the farming business is vital for them. Narine has applied for this loan to be able to purchase a calf and forage for feeding the livestock. As this is her first loan, it has been approved within the framework of the new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF. The first-chance loan program provides loans to people who didn’t have access to credit products in the past because they have no credit history. 

Narine ensures that she will be able to make credit payments on time, and she hopes for lenders' support.

loans.use: to pay for a calf and forage for feeding the livestock

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase insulation materials and some furniture to provide decent living conditions for his family.

loans.name: Ines Alfredo

texts.es: Ines de 30 años de edad es un hombre trabajador, responsable, honesto que siempre esta pendiente de su familia, desde hace varios años posee una tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia, posee mucha clientela por que siempre tiene lo que sus clientes buscan y aprecios muy accesibles, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Ines esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de golosinas, sopas, granos básicos, refrescos, leche, etc, para surtir aun mas su tienda y obtener mejores ganancias para darle a su familia lo que necesitan sin limitaciones algunas.
texts.en: 30-year-old Ines is a hard-working, responsible, and honest man who is always looking after his family. He has owned a store located in his home for several years. He has a large clientele because he always has what his customers are looking for and at a reasonable price. He manages to cover some of his household expenses with what he obtains from his work. Ines is requesting a loan in order to purchase candy, soup, staple grains, soft drinks, milk, and other items so he can restock his store, obtain greater profits, and give his family whatever they need.

loans.use: to purchase candy, soup, staple grains, soft drinks, milk, etc

loans.name: Simeona

texts.en:
Simeona is 38 years old. She is married with four children, aged 4 to 12. For three years now, she has been farming vegetables together with her husband. She plants green beans together with her husband to earn a living. She is asking for a loan to buy insecticides, fertilizer and seeds. This way she can take good care of her crop.

Simeona hopes that she can make her business a success so she can send her children to school, and they can be successful with their lives.

loans.use: to buy insecticides, fertilizer and seeds

loans.name: Alaa

texts.en: Alaa is 20 years old. She lives with her parents in a sector of Jordan called Baqaa. She is a university student majoring in Computer Information Systems, and she is in her second year. Alaa is planning to find a better job after her graduation, and to earn better income in order to support her family. However, because of the financial crisis her family has been facing, she wasn't able to pay for her upcoming semester fees. For this reason, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: to pay for her upcoming semester fees.

loans.name: Ana Jonhi

texts.es:
Ana tiene 38 años de edad, es madre soltera de cuatro hijos de 23, 16, 11 y 3 años de edad, ella estudió hasta noveno grado por las noches en la ciudad, pues tenía que trabajar cuidando una casa y haciendo los oficios de ese lugar. Hoy en día vive en su casa con sus hijos de los cuales dos estudian en la comunidad.
Ana tiene una tienda desde hace 16 años, debido a su situación de madre soltera, ella decidió por cuenta propia emprender su pequeño negocio, va todos los días a vender a la escuela de la comunidad, que está a 200 metros de donde ella vive, su hija mayor le ayuda con los cuidados del hogar mientras ella trabaja, también los días domingos sale con el equipo de futbol de su comunidad para comercializar sus productos.

Ella solicita este préstamo a CrediCampo, para comprar productos de primera necesidad y así poder incrementar el inventario en la tienda, de esta manera podrá tener más ofertas para sus clientes. También le comprará un pequeño terreno a su padre, donde construirá los baños para lo que necesita bloque, arena y cemento para poder construirlos.
Ana sueña con seguir creciendo poco a poco en su pequeña tienda, lo logrará con las ganancias que esta le dé, también quiere hacer un cuarto de bloque, y así ir mejorando su casa.
texts.en:
Ana is 38 years old and a single mother. She has four children, who are 23, 16, 11, and 3 years of age. She studied up until the ninth grade at night school in the city, since she had to work looking after a house and doing the housework. Now she lives in her own house with her children, two of whom are studying in the community.

Ana has had a store for sixteen years. Due to her situation as a single mother, she decided to start her small business. Every day she goes and sells products at a school in her community, which is located 200 metres away from where she lives. Her oldest daughter helps out with the housework while Ana is working. On Sundays she goes to the community’s soccer game to sell her products.

She is requesting this loan from CrediCampo in order to purchase commodities so she can increase her store’s inventory, thereby enabling her to offer more to her clients. She will also purchase a small plot of land from her father, on which she will build bathrooms. She will need cinder blocks, sand, and cement in order to build them.

Ana dreams of her business continuing to grow. She will achieve this with the profits this loan will give her. She also wants to build a room of brick, thereby continuing to improve her house.

loans.use: to purchase commodities to increase her store's inventory, and purchase a plot of land from her father

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more beans, pepper, rice, peanuts, etc., to resell.

loans.name: Maria Aracely

texts.es:
María Aracely tiene un grado de educación de primaria completo, la cual aprendió a trabajar la tierra a muy temprana edad sin embargo con ayuda de su compañero de hogar tiene mucha experiencia en cultivo de café. María Aracely tiene 5 hijos quienes estudian en la escuela de la comunidad y diariamente trabajan fuertemente para que a ellos no les falte nada o al menos lo básico para el diario vivir como la vestimenta, la alimentación, la medicina aunque con muchas restricciones, etc. La actividad económica que genera ingresos para su familia es el cultivo de café y la propiedad la cual es propia está ubicada a 15 kilómetros de distancia desde su casa de habitación al cual se traslada en compañía de su pareja en el autobús de la comunidad. El café una vez recolectado lo venden en la misma comunidad con familiares, amigos e intermediarios. 
Su mayor anhelo es que sus hijos menores sean profesionales y tengan un mejor futuro por lo que día con día lucha en compañía de su conyugue para que eso se posible, hacer mejoras a su vivienda las cuales son necesarias y poco a poco ir ampliando sus cultivos para algún día ser la menor productora de la zona. Hoy en día ha solicitado financiamiento con el cual comprara insumos agrícolas para mantener sus cultivos sanos y poder al final de la cosecha obtener un buen grano ya que como antes se menciona su economía depende de este rubro para el bienestar de su familia y hogar el cual trae mucho beneficio.
texts.en: Maria Aracely completed primary school.  She learned while very young to cultivate the land, and with the help of her life partner she has a lot of experience growing coffee.  Maria Aracely has 5 children who attend the community school, and she and her partner work every day so that they will have everything they need, or at least the basics such as clothing, food and medicine, although with many restrictions.  The economic activity that earns income for the family is growing coffee.  The property that they own is located 15 kilometers from their house. The couple travels there by bus from their community.  Once the coffee is harvested they sell it in the same community, to family, friends and intermediaries. Her greatest desire is that her children become professionals and have a better future.  This is why she and her partner struggle every day, so that it will be possible to make needed improvements to their home, and little by little increase their harvest until they are the best producers in the area.  They are now requesting a loan, with which to buy agricultural supplies to keep their crops healthy and be able in the end to offer a good product. This is because, as previously mentioned, their financial well-being depends on this work for the well-being of her family and household, which it greatly benefits.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, manure, foliar pesticides. etc. to help their coffee crop.

loans.name: Fuerza 2008 Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “FUERZA 2008” de la Asociación Arariwa de la ciudad del Cusco. 
Rosa vive en la ciudad del Cusco y donde realiza todas sus actividades personales y económicas. Su actividad económica principal es la venta de comida, ella prepara diferentes platos típicos de la región como por ejemplo lomo saldado, arroz con pollo, arroz verde, tallarín verde y sopas. Rosa es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora que saca adelante a su familia y en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar insumos como por ejemplo verduras, carnes, arroz, aceite y entre otros.

Los demás socios se dedican al negocio de venta de tejidos, comida, lubricantes de carros, ropa y otros brindan servicios profesionales. los socios agradecen a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These entrepreneurs are members of the communal bank “FUERZA 2008” in Asociación Arariwa in the city of Cusco.

Rosa lives and works in the city of Cusco. Her main job is selling food. She prepares different regional meals, such as lomo saltado (traditional stir-fry), arroz con pollo (rice with chicken), arroz verde (green rice), tallarín verde (pasta with spinach and basil sauce), and soups. Rosa is a very hard-working and enterprising woman who helps her family to get ahead. She needs the loan in order to purchase supplies, such as vegetables, meat, rice, and oil. 

The other members have businesses selling fabric, food, lubricants for cars, and clothes, while others provide professional services. The members are grateful to those who are part of this dream through the site and they are committed to making their repayments on time.

loans.use: to purchase supplies, such as vegetables, meat, rice, and oil

loans.name: Mahd

texts.en: Mahd is 21 years old. He lives in a sector of Jordan called Irbid. Mahd is currently working in a satellite store. He is also studying for his Bachelor's, majoring in Economics, and he is in his third year. He is planning to find a better job after his graduation and to earn a better income in order to support his family. However, because of the financial crisis his family has been facing, he wasn't able to pay for his upcoming semester fees. For this reason, he applied for this loan.

loans.use: to pay for his next semester fees.

loans.name: Safa

texts.en: Safa is 21 years old, and she lives with her parents and two siblings in a sector of Jordan called Salt. She is a university student majoring in Supporting Medicine Sciences, and she is in her second year. Safa is planning to find a better job after graduation and to earn a better income in order to support her family. However, because of the financial crisis her family has been facing, she wasn't able to pay for her upcoming semester fees. For this reason, she applied for this loan.

loans.use: to pay for her upcoming semester fees.

loans.name: Engari Nyekundire Group

texts.en:
Remegio is a married man from Engari village with seven children. Five of his children are in school. He is a farmer who deals in goat rearing and trade. He runs his business with limited capital. His customers are fellow farmers who buy goats for rearing. He supports his goat project with his coffee farm, where he earns during the coffee season. His major challenge is the dry spell and high cost of veterinary drugs, which make farming expensive.

Remegio has applied for a loan to help him buy more goats for resale and build an improved shelter for his goats; he will use the rest of the money to pay tuition for his children. Remegio is a very honest and hard-working man. He hopes to build a permanent home for his family and also take his children to better schools.

loans.use: To buy goats

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more beans, peppers, oil, peanuts, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to improve the roof on his home

loans.name: Noe

texts.es:
Noe de 73 años de edad, debido a la situación económica de sus padres,  no pudieron darle el estudio ya que era una familia bastante numerosa y con muy escasos recursos económicos tenían que trabajar no tuvo esa oportunidad de aprender, sus hijos ya son mayores de edad y tienen su propia familia quienes dependen de ellos, su esposa le ayuda en el hogar ya que se dedica a los oficios domésticos.

Noe  se a dedicado desde muy pequeño al trabajo agrícola, ya que su padre y sus hermanos se han dedicado a esta actividad esto lo hace en épocas de invierno, trabaja todo el día para  obtener un buen producto y buenos resultados y en épocas de verano se dedica a trabajar en una cantera quebrando piedra y posteriormente venderla se va por la mañana y trabaja todo el día para  terminar y vender alguna camionada de piedra; esta actividad la desempeña desde muy pequeño su padre le enseño y a sus hermanos también.


Los fondos del crédito serán utilizados, para  comprar  3 semovientes, ya que espera que al final del año pueda vender dos y tener una ganancia de uno que le quede.

Los sueños que tiene para el futuro, es seguir trabajado hasta cuando ya no pueda y siempre valerse por si mismo y mantener a su esposa.
texts.en:
Noe is 73 years old. Due to the economic situation of his parents, they could not give him an education. They had a large family with limited economic resources, so they had to work and did not have the opportunity to learn. His children are grown up and have their own families that depend on them. His wife helps him with their home and takes care of household chores. 

Since he was young, Noe has worked in the farm business. His father and his siblings also work in this business which done during the winter seasons. He works all day to get a good product and good results. During the summer months, he works in a quarry where he breaks stone and later sells it. He leaves in the mornings and works all day to finish and sell a truckload of stone. He has carried out this work since he was very young when his father taught him and his brothers.

The loan funds will be used to buy three livestock as he hopes by the end of the year to sell two and have revenue from the one that will stay. 

His dreams for the future are to continue working until he can no longer do so and always fend for himself and support his wife.

loans.use: to buy three livestock.

loans.name: Caidakram

texts.ru:
Саидакрам добродушный и жизнерадостный мужчина в возрасте 35 лет. Он женат, и имеет двоих детей. Всю свою душу он вкладывает в свою семью и работу. Саидакрам живёт со своей семьёй  в небольшом доме в сельском посёлке. Чтобы прокормить свою семью он занимается своим бизнесом. Саидакрам занимается деканством и животноводством. У него имеется земельная площадь. На этой земле Саидакрам пасёт своих скот. А его жена помогает ему ухаживать и растить скот.

Бизнес животноводства приносит хороший доход. На полученные деньги от своего бизнеса Саидакрам смог сделать очень многое для своей семьи. Он сделал хороший ремонт в своём доме, и теперь они могут благополучно проживать в нём. Но сейчас Саидакрам хочет расширить свой бизнес, увеличив поголовье своего скота. Для этого он обратился в Арванд, чтобы получить кредит на покупку скота. Саидакрам заранее благодарит Арванд за финансовую поддержку.
texts.en:
Caidakram is a good hearted and cheerful man.  He is 35 years old, married and has two children.  He pours all his heart and soul into his family and work.  Saidakram and his family live in a little house in a small village.  In order to feed his family, Caidakram runs his own business.  His business is in farming and animal husbandry.  He has a plot of land where he puts his cattle out to pasture.  His wife helps him to raise and take care of the cattle.

The animal husbandry business brings in a good income.  Caidakram has been able to do a lot for his family with the money he earns from his business.  He remodeled and repaired his home and now they can live there comfortably.  But now Caidakram wants to expand his business by increasing the size of his herd.  To do this he applied to MDO Arvand for a loan to buy cattle.  Caidakram thanks MDO Arvand in advance for its financial support.

loans.use: to buy a cattle

loans.name: Ashirbu

texts.ru: Аширбу 55 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитали детей, дети все взрослые проживают отдельно. У Аширбу - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Аширбу занимается животноводством, стартовав 9 лет назад, с покупки скота на 12,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Аширбу, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 30 овец. Ежемесячный доход составляет 13,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Аширбу обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом - на покупку овец для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Аширбу планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на строительство нового помещения для скота.
texts.en:
Ashirbu is 55 years old and married.  She and her husband raised children who are now all adults and live separately from them.  Ashirbu has a secondary level education.  Her family's main income is from the animal husbandry business she started nine years ago with the purchase of 12,000 som (KGS) worth of cattle.  As a result of her hard work, today Ashirbu has 30 sheep.  Her monthly income amounts to 13,000 som (KGS).

With an aim to further developing her business, Ashirbu applied to Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan to buy sheep to increase the size of her herd.  Ashirbu plans to invest the profits from the loan in further increasing the size of her herd.  She also plans to save money to build a new cattle barn.

loans.use: to buy sheep

loans.name: Nancy Ericelda

texts.es:
Nancy de 38 años de edad, estudio educación media, esta casada ,su esposo trabaja en un pequeño taller que tiene en su casa sus dos hijos residen con ellos 1 estudian 1º  grado,  por lo que solo vive con sus dos hijos y su esposo el  cuales trabaja para sostener los gastos del hogar.

 Nancy se dedica a los queaceres del hogar, mientras su esposo trabaja en la carpintería quien tiene 6 años de experiencia en dicha actividad,  la cual la aprendió en un taller de un tío mientras que Nancy en sus ratos libres la ayuda con la carpintería, esas son las actividades que ella realiza para sacar adelante a familia.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a CREDICAMPO, es para comprar materia prima para el taller de su esposo (madera, pintura, barniz), también construirá una habitación más a su casa.


  Los suenos de Nancy son  mejorar el taller de su esposo con mas maquinaria, ya que esa es de donde sale su fuente de ingreso y luego, preparar académicamente a sus hijos y hacerle mas mejoras a su casa y espera de que Dios le de salud para seguir trabajando, para que esto se le haga realidad y gracias a los créditos espera lograrlos.
texts.en:
Nancy is 38 years old, married, and studied secondary education. Her husband works in a small workshop in his house. Their two children live with them. One studies in the first grade. She only lives with her two children and husband who works to cover their living expenses. Nancy takes care of the household chores while he husband works in the workshop. He has six years of experience in this work which he learned in his uncle's workshop. Nancy helps with the workshop in her free time. These are the tasks she completes to get her family ahead. 

She is requesting a loan from CrediCampo to buy raw materials for her husband's shop such as wood, paint and varnish. She will also build another room in her house. 

Nancy's dreams are to improve her husband's workshop with more machinery because it is their only source of income. She also dreams of preparing her children academically, and making improvements in her home. She hopes that God will grant her health to continue working so that she can make this a reality. Thanks to the loans she hopes to achieve these dreams.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for her husband's workshop (wood, paint, varnish) and to construct an additional room in her house.

loans.name: Gulsara

texts.ru:
Гулсара добрая,жизнерадостная женщина. Ей  56 лет, живет в сельской местности Дж.Расуловского района. К сожалению Гулсара вдова и несколько лет тому назад потеряла мужа. У нее четверо детей. Дети уже взрослые  и у всех свои собственные семьи. Дети стараются помогать своей матери но Гулсара  сама тоже не сидит сложа руки. Она очень старательная и трудолюбивая женщина. После смерти мужа ей было очень одиноко и дети ее поддерживали во всем. Гулсара очень хочет обучить своих внуков и для этого копит деньги.

Гулсара занимается скотоводством. Откармливает крупно рогатый скот. Этим делом она занимается уже 10 лет. Она покупает 1-2 летних скотов, откармливает 3-4 месяца и продает мясникам. Это занятия ей очень нравиться. у нее очень хороший доход от этого. Гусара планирует купить скот и к концу весны продать так как в это время скот подорожает. Она подала заявку на кредит и хочет на приобретенный кредит купить скот. Гулсара очень надеется что в Арванде ей помогут и она сможет осуществить свои планы, обучить своих внуков.
texts.en: Gulsara is a kind and happy woman.  She is 56 years old and lives in a rural area in the J. Rasulov district. Unfortunately, Gulsara is a widow and lost her husband several years ago.  She has four children.  The children are already grown and have their own families.  The children try to help their mother, but Gulsara also does not sit with her hands down.  She is a very diligent and hardworking woman.  She was very lonely after her husband's death, and her children supported her in everything.  Gulsara wants to educate her grandsons and is saving money for this.  Gulsara is involved in animal husbandry.  She fattens up cattle.  She has been in this business for 10 years.  She buys 1-2 year-old livestock, fattens them up for 3-4 months and sells them to butchers.  She likes her business very much and has a very good income from it.  Gulsara plans to buy livestock and resell it by the end of spring when livestock prices go up.  She requested this loan and wants to use the loan to buy livestock.  Gulsara hopes very much that she will be helped at Arvand and that she will realize her plans and educate her grandsons.

loans.use: to buy livestock

loans.name: Muhtaram

texts.ru: Человек с огромным сердцем доброты и прекрасной душой, нуждается вашей финансовой поддержки. Ее зовут Мухтарам. Она живет с мужем и детьми в отдаленном регионе. Она очень трудолюбивая женщина. Мухтарам 7 лет назад начала свой бизнес скотоводством. У нее 3  коровы в обороте. У нее большой огород, где она выращивает сено для скота. Она продает молоко своим соседям и соседи очень довольны от полученного натурального молочного продукта. Она запрашивает займ на сумму  6000  сомони для покупки скота, чтобы увеличить оборотный капитал и таким образом развевать бизнес. С полученного  дохода она собирается улучшить условию проживания. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: A person with an enormous heart, kindness and beautiful soul needs your financial support.  Her name is Muhtaram.  She lives with her husband and children in a distant district.  She is a very hardworking woman.  Muhtaram started her animal husbandry business 7 years ago.  She has 3 cows in her working capital.  She has a large garden, where she grows hay for the livestock.  She sells milk to her neighbors and the neighbors are happy with the natural milk product.  She is requesting a loan in the amount of 6000 somoni to buy livestock in order to increase her working capital and thus develop her business.  She plans to improve her living conditions with the resulting income.  She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to buy livestock for increasing working capital

loans.name: Gloria Fanny

texts.es:
Gloria Fanny es una señora de 56 años, vive junto a su hijo Roberto que ya es un joven mayor de edad. Radican en la ciudad Santo Domingo de los  Tsachilas ciudad de la región costa, con un clima agradable, conocida en Ecuador por la etnia de indígenas Tsachilas que habitan en el sector 
Gloria vive separada hace 23 años, su esposo los abandonó; ella sacó adelante a su hijo a quien le dio la educación, ahora ya terminó la secundaria y se encuentra trabajando. Gloria para ello tuvo que esforzarse mucho, comenzó a vender ropa, sábanas y carteras en recintos cercanos de la ciudad, recorría seis días a la semana, pero gracias a este esfuerzo pudo llevar dinero a su hogar para salir adelante a pesar de las dificultades que se le presentaba.
En esta temporada Gloria necesita de capital para la compra de mercadería. Una amiga que es clienta de la institución le recomendó. Gloria pudo obtener un crédito con el mismo podrá comprar todo lo necesario para la temporada de carnaval, comprará blusas, pantalones y shores que su clientela le solicita. Se siente muy agradecida por la oportunidad que Fundación Alternativa y Kiva le han dado, está feliz ya que es un sueño cumplido para su crecimiento laboral y familiar.
texts.en:
Gloria Fanny is a 56 year-old woman who lives with her son Roberto who is already a young man.  They live in the city of Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas, which is a coastal city with a mild climate that is known in Ecuador for its indigenous Tsachila population.   

Gloria has been separated for 23 years; her husband abandoned her.  She got her son ahead and gave him an education; now he has finished high school and he is working.  Gloria worked very hard to accomplish that; she started selling clothing, sheets, and wallets in the city's neighborhoods.  She went on her rounds six days a week, but thanks to this effort she was able to bring home the money to get ahead despite the obstacles she faced.  

Gloria currently needs money to buy merchandise.  A friend of hers who is a client of the institution recommended it to her.  Gloria was able to get a loan with the institution that she will use to buy everything she needs for Carnival season; she will buy the blouses, pants, and shorts that her clientele are asking for.  She is very thankful for the opportunity Fundación Alternativa and Kiva have given her and she is happy, as this is a dream come true for her professional and familial growth.

loans.use: to buy merchandise

loans.name: Gulfara

texts.ru: Гульфаре 53 года, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитали сына, у сына уже своя личная семья. Супруг работает в налоговой инспекции, имеет ежемесячную и стабильную зарплату, в свободное время помогает Гульфаре по хозяйству. У Гульфары -среднее образование. В качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Гульфара занимается полеводством и животноводством, стартовав 19 лет назад, с 10,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Гульфары, на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 лошади, 1 нетель, 15 овец,1,0 ГА земельной доли, на которой ежегодно выращивает картофель, фасоль для внутрихозяйственного потребления и реализации. Ежемесячный доход составляет 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Гульфара обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом -на покупку удобрений для обработки земли, чтобы посредством этого получить хороший урожай. Доходы от кредита Гульфара планирует вложить в приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на образование внуков.
texts.en: Gulfara is 53 years old, married and raised a son together with her husband, and their son already has his own family. Her husband works at a tax inspection and has a monthly and stable salary, and helps Gulfara with the business in his free time.  Gulfara has a secondary education.  To provide the primary source of income for her family, Gulfara is involved in farming and animal husbandry, having started 19 years ago with 10,000 som (KGS).  Thanks to Gulfara's hard work, today her business contains 2 horses, 1 heifer, 15 sheep and 1.0 hectares of land, where she annually grows potatoes and beans for internal consumption and sale.  The monthly income amounts to 10,000 som (KGS). In order to further develop her business, Gulfara requested a loan from the bank "Bai-Tushum" to buy fertilizers for treating the soil in order to get a good harvest. Gulfara plans to invest the earnings from the loan into increasing domestic livestock quantities and saving money for her grandsons' education.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers

loans.name: Gustavo

texts.es:
Gustavo, con 67 años de edad, está felizmente casado y es padre de 3 hijos a los que ha sacado adelante con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación. Se trasladó con su familia desde su ciudad natal, con el fin de buscar nuevas oportunidades para salir adelante, y para estar más cerca de algunos familiares. Durante su vida productiva trabajó como empleado en una entidad financiera y de manera alterna había comenzado una sala de internet para complementar los ingresos y velar por el bienestar de su familia, razón por la que su experiencia es de más de 15 años, esto lo motivó para montar el mismo negocio en compañía de su esposa (ver foto) que estará ubicado en la casa donde vive con su familia; ya tiene todos los equipos de cómputo e impresoras, pero desea incluir la venta de productos de papelería y para consumo de sus clientes, por lo que requiere comprar unas vitrinas exhibidoras, insumos de papelería y surtido de mecato, gaseosas, dulces y otros, así podrá reiniciar su actividad y generar ingresos para su familia.
Gustavo manifiesta que su mayor anhelo es poder acreditar bien su negocio y consolidarlo en la zona, para que sea reconocido, rentable y le permita disfrutar una mejor calidad de vida en compañía de su grupo familiar.
texts.en:
Gustavo, who is 67 years old, is happily married and the father of three children whom he has gotten ahead through a great deal of effort and dedication.  

Some time ago, he moved with his family from his native city to seek out new opportunities to get ahead and to be closer to some relatives.  During his professional life he worked for a finance company and he started an internet café on the side to make more money and ensure his family's wellbeing.  

He has more than 15 years of experience, which motivated him to start the same business with his wife (see photo), which will be located in the house where he lives with his family.  He has purchased all the computer equipment and printers with savings, but he wants to include stationery products for his customers to buy, which require some display cases, stationery supplies, and snacks, soda, candy, and other things.  This will allow him to restart his business and generate income for his family. 

Gustavo tells us that his greatest wish is to set up his business well and to establish it in the area so that it is known, profitable, and allows him to enjoy a better quality of life in the company of his family.

loans.use: to start his own business with his wife

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy farming supplies and to pay for labor to care for her coffee crops.

loans.name: Pedro

texts.es: Pedro tiene 30 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida y sus tres hijos de 16 años, 12 años y 4 años de edad. Pedro trabaja como auxiliar de albañil lo cual le permite ganarse el sustento diario y ganarse el pan de cada día para él y su querida familia. Tiene plena confianza que con el tiempo logrará convertirse en un gran albañil. Pedro ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción de un muro de retención y así proteger su terreno el cual se lava en tiempos de lluvia. Con el monto solicitado comprará cemento, arena, ladrillo y hierro.
texts.en: Pedro is 30 years old and lives in his own home with his life partner and their three children, who are 16, 12, and 4 years old. Pedro works as a bricklayer’s assistant, which allow him to earn his daily bread for himself and his beloved family. He is confident that in time he will become a great bricklayer. Pedro has decided to request this loan from FUSAI to invest in building a retaining wall to protect his land, which gets washed away in rainy periods. He will use the requested loan to buy cement, sand, bricks, and rebar.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, bricks, and rebar to build a retaining wall.

loans.name: María Isabel

texts.es:
María de 29 años de edad, estudio hasta tercer grado de educación, está casada su esposo se dedica a la agricultura tiene 2 hijos  los cuales viven  en casa de ella, uno  estudia. 


María es agricultora en pequeño, junto a su esposo se dedican a esta labor desde hace 8 años   deciden dedicarse a esta labor, porque no encuentran otra forma de sacar a su familia adelante. Ella  aprendió esta labor de su familia,  ya que el padre de ella es agricultor, el trabajo está a 3 kilómetros  los cuales recorren a pie el horario de trabajo es 6 horas al día.


El préstamo que está solicitando, es para comprar  material para la construcción,  porque hay una parte de su casa que está en malas condiciones, ella comprara madera y adobe esto servirá para proteger a su familia.


Ella sueña con tener un negocio, que le proporcione los suficientes ingresos para darle mejor condiciones de vida a sus hijos, espera para sus hijos crezcan y se desarrollen,  estudiando de buena manera. 
Desea ayudar  a su familia estableciendo un negocio que pueda darlos como familia mejores ingresos y cubrir de mejor manera las necesidades que tienen.
texts.en:
María, 29, has a third grade education.  She is married to a farmer and they have two children, one of whom attends school.

María has a small farming activity which she and her husband have been running for eight years since it is the only work they have found to support the family.  She learned the trade from her family since her father was a farmer.  The farmland is three kilometers from home and and they walk there, working an average six hours a day.

The loan she is requesting is to buy construction materials because part of the house is in disrepair.  She plans to buy wood and adobe to protect the family.

She dreams of opening a business that will give her enough income to give her children better living conditions.  She hopes her children grow, develop and become good students.  She wants to support the family by setting up a business so she can earn more and give them everything they need.

loans.use: To buy wood and adobe.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy the cosmetics she needs to fill orders and to pay off a current loan.

loans.name: Kurbonaly

texts.en:
Kurbonaly was born in 1968. He is a kind and hardworking man. Kurbonaly is married and has three children. He lives with his family in the capital of Tajikistan. 

Kurbonaly began his business with selling children's clothes 14 years ago. Then he changed his business. Now, he sells curtains. Kurbonaly sells curtains in a local market. He has his own regular customers. Kurbonaly is going to increase his working capital. He is the main breadwinner of his family; that’s why he needs to earn money. He is asking for a loan of 5,000 Tajikistani somoni to buy a variety of curtains for increasing his working capital. He awaits your support.

loans.use: to buy a variety of curtains for increasing his working capital.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy bath soap, clothes softener, shampoo and other items for her store, as well as to pay off an old loan and to sell tortillas.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more charcoal for her business.

loans.name: Zoila Ambrocio

texts.es:
Zoila de 53 años de edad estudio solo primer grado, la escuela a una distancia  de una hora de camino, desde su casa y tenía que transitar en medio de fincas cultivada por café, a su edad que era una niña corría muchos peligro ya que sus padres no podían acompañarle siendo personas de escasos recursos, tenían que trabajar los dos para poder darles el alimento. Ella esta soltera tiene un hijo que trabaja en una ferretería y es la persona que le ayuda en los gastos del hogar, en su casa solo viven ellos dos y la mama de ella.

Zoila se dedica a los oficios del hogar y aprendió el oficio de coser también y hoy se dedica a la sastrería, en su  momentos libres con ello puede tener un ingreso para apoyar a su hijo, en los gastos del hogar ya que ella el trabajo es poco lo realiza en su casa, cuando termina de realizar los oficios domésticos, así puede llevar el trabajo de ama de casa y sastre al mismo tiempo.

Con el crédito ella podrá comprar cemento, hierro, arena, ladrillo y cancelar mano de obra para construir la cocina, ya que la tiene dentro de su casa y esto le genera un poco de incomodidad, esto le   permitirá cocinar libremente y lograr mayor espacio en su casa y lograr tener una mejor higiene. 

Zoila desea que con la ayuda del crédito poder ver terminada su cocina, y ya no tener estos problemas por estar todo junto la sala, habitación, cocina dentro de la casa, espera que su hijo estudie una carrera universitaria, para que tenga un buen trabajo mejor que el que tiene
texts.en:
Zoila, 53, has a first grade education since the school she attended was an hour away from home and she had to cross several coffee plantations to get there.  As a little girl it was very dangerous and her parents could not accompany her since they had a low income and both had to work to put food on the table.  She is single and has a son who works in a hardware store.  He helps her out with household expenses.  They live together with Zoila's mother.

Zoila is a homemaker and also has a sewing business in her free time to make extra income to help her son cover the household expenses.  She works at home so she can do both the housework and sewing at the same time.

The loan will be used to buy cement, iron, sand and bricks and to hire a worker to build a kitchen.  The one she has now is inside the house and makes things too uncomfortable.  Building a new one will give her more space at home and allow her to cook more openly, improving hygiene.

Zoila hopes that with the help of the loan she can finish her kitchen and do away with the problems of having the living room, bedroom and kitchen inside the house.  She hopes her son will get a university degree so he can get a better job than the one he has.

loans.use: To buy cement, iron, sand, bricks and hire workers to build a kitchen.

loans.name: Manuel Antonio

texts.es:
Manuel de 33 años de edad solo logro estudiar hasta sexto grado, actualmente está acompañado él tiene 10 años de trabajar como motorista en un bus, camina  6 kilómetros del trabajo a  su casa, su hogar está conformado por  su compañera de vida y  tres hijas, las cuales dos de ella están estudiando su esposa no trabaja solo se dedica a los oficios de su casa.
Manuel trabaja como motorista esto lo aprendió de su padre que también era motorista, es la única fuente de ingreso que él tiene, ya que su esposa no puede realizar ningún tipo de trabajo, porque padece de una enfermedad  únicamente el aporta al hogar.
Manuel necesita su crédito para poder mejorar su casa, ya que hasta el momento está muy deteriorada lo cual necesita unas mejoras urgentemente, porque se acerca la temporada lluviosa en donde sus hijos deben estar seguros.
Manuel sueña en poder llegar a tener una vivienda digna, en la cual pueda vivir con sus hijas y su esposa sin miedo, a que les pueda llegar a pasar algo por catástrofe o por alguna persona que le quiera hacer daño, y sabe que todo esto lo puede lograr con la ayuda del crédito
texts.en:
Manuel, 33, only has a sixth grade education.  He lives with is common-law wife and has worked for ten years as a bus driver.  He walks six kilometers from home to work.  He lives with his wife and three daughters who attend school.  His wife is a homemaker.

Manuel learned his driving skill from his father who was also a driver.  It is the only source of income he has since his wife cannot work because of an illness, so he is the only bread winner.

Manuel is in need of a loan to renovate his house because it is very dilapidated and in need of urgent repair.  The rainy season is approaching and he wants his children to be safe.  He dreams about having a dignified life and being able to live with his daughters and wife without fear of something happening to them in a catastrophe or if someone wanted to harm them.  He knows that with the help of a loan he will be able to achieve his goal.

loans.use: To renovate his house.

loans.name: Grace

texts.en: Grace is a fifty-year-old mother of six children living in Fort Portal. She is a livestock farmer and also owns a bar to supplement her income. She has been in this business for ten years, which has helped her to improve her sources of income. She has a dream of expanding her farm and buying more heifers for the purpose of milk production, which is only limited by capital.

loans.use: to buy a heifer.

loans.name: Evangelista

texts.es: Evangelista tiene 47 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su grupo familiar. Ella se dedica a la venta de pupusas (preparación alimenticia a base de masa de maíz, frijoles, queso, etc.) desde hace más de 5 años. De esta forma se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Evangelista desea terminar de construir el muro perimetral y así dar mayor seguridad a su familia por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, cemento, arena y hierro.
texts.en:
Evangelista is 47 years old and lives in her own home with her family. She has sold pupusas (a dish made of corn flour, beans, cheese, etc.) for over five years. She earns her living doing this and it puts food on the table. 

Evangelista would like to finish building a perimetre fence to give her family better security, which is why she is applying for a loan from FUSAI. She will use this loan to purchase bricks, cement, sand and iron.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, sand and iron to build a perimetre fence

loans.name: Berta Noemi

texts.es:
Berta de 42 años de edad  no pudo estudiar por falta de recursos, otra fue la distancia de su casa al centro de estudio, ella actualmente está casada y su esposo se dedica a trabajar en finca cortando café, limpiando y podando, ella tiene 4 hijos pero solo tres viven con ella, ya que la mayor  está casada y los hijos que viven son 3 una tiene 21 años y el año pasado salió de bachiller contador, la otra tiene 15 años y está estudiando 7° grado y el menor es barón,  y tiene 9 años y estudia tercero su hogar está conformado por el esposo y sus hijos.

Berta se dedica a trabajar en la agricultura y también trabaja en la finca  limpiando y cortando café, ella  se dedica a trabajar desde su niñez en la agricultura, ya que por la falta de recursos tuvo que trabajar para ayudar en los gastos de su casa. Para que sus padres pudieran darles la educación a sus hermanos, ella no pudo estudiar pero si quería que sus hermanos pudieran tener una educación a la que ella no pudo acceder, su trabajo le queda a 40 minutos a pie desde su casa tiene que madrugar para dejar la comida para sus hijos, y luego salir a trabajar y cuando ella regresa en la tarde tiene que ir a realizar los oficios del hogar.

Con el crédito ella podrá comprar arena y cemento para la construcción de un muro, ya que en la temporada de lluvias recién pasado tuvo problemas de deslave en su terreno, y no quiere que ese problema se le siga haciendo más grande, y prefiere evitarlo por medio del crédito y evitar un peligro muy grande, así iniciar  el trabajo a tiempo.

Berta sueña en un futuro que  sus hijos terminen sus estudios, para que sean personas de bien en la comunidad. También quiere ver su casa más grande y ver crecer a sus nietos y que el problema que tiene ahorita por la falta del muro sea arreglado con el crédito.
texts.en:
Berta is forty two years old. She could not study because she lacked the financial resources and also because of the distance between her home and the school. Berta is now married and her husband works on a farm cutting, cleaning and pruning coffee. She has four children but only three live with her as the older one is married. Of the three children who live with her, one is 21 years old and graduated as an accountant last year, the other is 15 years old and is in Year 7 and the youngest, a boy, is nine years old and in Grade 3. Berta’s home is made up of her husband and her children.

Berta works in agriculture and also works on the farm cleaning and cutting coffee. She has worked in agriculture since her childhood, because as they had a lack of financial resources she had to help with the household costs. In order for her parents to send her siblings to school, she was unable to go to school, but she did want her siblings to study and get the education that she missed out on. Berta’s job is a 40 minute walk from home. She has to get up very early to feed her children and then go out to work. When she comes home in the afternoon she has to do the household tasks. 

With this loan Berta can buy sand and cement to build a wall. They have had many problems with landslides in the recent wet season and she doesn’t want this problem to become bigger, so she would prefer to avoid it through this loan and avoid an even greater risk by starting the project in time.

Berta dreams of a future where her children have finished their studies and have become decent people in the community. She would also like to extend her house and watch her grandchildren grow. She hopes that the problem she has right now because of the lack of a wall will be put right with this loan.

loans.use: to buy sand and cement to build a wall

loans.name: Nancy

texts.es: La Señora Nancy sigue con la misma actividad de la elaboración y venta de comida,  cuenta que le fue muy bien con el anterior crédito ya que lo utilizo en la compra de mesas y sillas para ampliar su negocio,   en esta ocasión solicita el crédito para la compra de insumos como abarrotes, aceite y papa al por mayor, se siente feliz y agradecida con los prestamistas de Kiva por la oportunidad que le dan para crecer en su negocio y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Nancy is still doing the same activity, making and selling food. She says that it went well for her with the previous loan. She used it to buy tables and chairs to expand her business. At this time, she is asking for the loan to buy ingredients such as produce, oil and potatoes wholesale. She s happy and grateful to the Kiva for the opportunity they are giving her to grow in her business and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy ingredients such as produce, oil, and potatoes wholesale.

loans.name: Benigno

texts.es:
Benigno de 53 años de edad, es casado tienen una hija pequeña, que estudia segundo grado su esposa trabaja en los oficios del hogar, él se dedica a la agricultura, a la crianza de ganado, su familia depende directamente de él, ya que solamente él trabaja para el sustento de su familia.

Benigno se dedica de lleno a la agricultura y a la crianza de ganado desde  más de treinta años, su papá fue quien le enseño el oficio, el camina alrededor de un kilómetro  donde tiene sus cultivos y su ganado, solamente estas actividades el realiza ya que fue lo que le enseño su padre.

El crédito lo utilizará para comprar una vaca y para la siembra de maíz y frijol. Para mejorar sus ingresos necesita trabajar más para la siembra y el ganado, para que este genere más ingresos  a él y a su familia, y así tener mejores condiciones de vida.
Benigno sueña en un futuro que su hija estudie y que sea una profesional, por eso  piensa trabajar fuertemente para que ese sueño se le haga realidad, y también piensa tener otro hijo  y piensa que mejorando sus ingresos eso puede ser posible
texts.en:
Benigno is 53 years old and married with a young daughter who is in Grade 2. His wife is a housewife and he works in agriculture raising cattle. His family completely depend on him as he is the only one who works to support his family.

Benigno has worked full time in agriculture raising cattle for more than thirty years. His father was the one who taught him how to do this job. He walks around a kilometer to the place where he keeps his crops and cattle. He only works in this area since this is what his father taught him to do.

He will use this loan to buy a cow and sow corn and beans. To improve his earnings he needs to work more towards his cultivation and his cattle. By generating a better income for himself and his family he will be able to create a better way of life.

Benigno dreams of a future where his daughter studies and becomes a professional, which is why he intends to work hard so that he can make this dream a reality. He is also thinking of having another child, which could be possible if he improves his income.

loans.use: to buy cows and sow corn and beans

loans.name: Jesús Santana

texts.es:
Jesús de 53 años de edad, estudio hasta sexto grado, esta acompañado, tienes tres hijos dos de ellos estan con él y una de ellas que ya esta acompañada el hijo estudia primer año de bachillerato. El cliente vive con dos hijos y una nieta. Su esposa hace un par de dias se fue de la casa a buscar trabajo, para apoyarle a él.

El negocio del cual genera ingresos es como albañil, el cliente inicio como auxiliar y de esa manera fue aprendiendo. Esa es la unica actividad que el cliente realiza, desde muy joven. El trabajo le queda muy retirado tiene que abordar varios a buses para llegar a su trabajo.
El préstamo lo utilizara para comprar materiales que necesita para desarrollar su actividad que actualmente realiza. Con el prestamo el mejorara su calidad de trabajo y con ello obtendra mejores ingresos. Su sueño es tener sus propias herramientas para poder hacer mejor su trabajo, darles estudio a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Jesús is 53 years old, studied until Grade 6 and has a partner and three children, two of whom live with him and one who has already found a partner. His son is studying the first year of his degree. This client lives with two sons and a granddaughter. His wife left home a couple of days ago to look for work to help support him.

Jesús generates an income out of a business as a construction worker. He began as an assistant and that way he was able to keep learning. This is the only job that the client has performed from a very young age. His job is a very long way away so he has to catch many buses to get to work.

Jesús will use this loan to buy the material he needs to complete the project he is currently working on. With this loan he will improve his quality of life and obtain a better income. His dream is to have his own tools to be able to do his job better and to provide his children with an education.

loans.use: to buy the materials he needs to complete his project

loans.name: Carmen Dolores

texts.es:
Carmen Dolores es una señora de 58 años, vive junto a sus dos hijos en la ciudad de Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas ciudad de la región costa, con un clima agradable. Es una ciudad muy comercial la misma que es considerada puerto terrestre que une a la sierra y a la costa.
Hace 13 años el esposo de Carmen emigró al extranjero y nunca más volvió, desde ese entonces Carmen tuvo que sacar adelante a sus hijos, comenzó a vender ropa a vecinas, luego fue incrementando su negocio poco a poco, ahora también vende cosméticos. Carmen es una señora muy trabajadora que incluso ha asistido a cursos de cocina que dan en el municipio de la ciudad y gracias a ello aprendió mucho y también en eventos especiales brinda sus servicios de preparar comida. 
Carmen conoció a Fundación Alternativa hace tres años quien recibió un crédito en grupo, ahora Carmen solicitó un crédito individual el mismo que lo invertirá en la compra de cosméticos y de ropa ya que se acerca la temporada de carnaval y es muy buen mes para las ventas. El sueño de Carmen es en un futuro no muy lejano ponerse su propio local, para vender sus productos y las manualidades que suele hacer en sus tiempos libres. Se siente muy agradecida porque la institución le ha ayudado a crecer y a mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Carmen Dolores is a 58 years old. She lives with her two children in the city of Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas. It is a city on the coastal region with a pleasant climate. It is a very commercial city, considered to be the land port between the sierra and the coast. 

Thirteen years ago, Carmen's husband immigrated to another country and never came back. Since then, Carmen had to get her two children ahead. She started to sell clothes to neighbors and later grew her business little by little. Now she sells cosmetics too. Carmen is a hardworking woman who has even taken cooking classes given by the city. Thanks to that, he learned a lot and she also offers her food preparation services for special events. 

Carmen learned about Fundación Alternativa three years ago when she received a group loan. Now Carmen asked for an individual loan, which she will invest in buying cosmetics and clothing. The Carnaval season is coming and it is very good for sales. Carmen's dream is that in the not so distant future she can open her own locale to sell products and handmade crafts that she does in her free time. She is very grateful because the institution has helped her to grow and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics and clothing.

loans.name: Farogat

texts.en:
Farogat is an industrious woman.  She began her own business deal with animal husbandry 14 years ago because she needed to money.  Farogat has adult children.  Her husband helps her with managing the business.  

Farogat has 3 cows now.  She feeds her cows in her house where she has a big cowshed.  She feeds the cows for 3 months and sells them in a local market.  She is asking for a loan of 1,000 TJS to buy cattle.  She awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy cattle

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
This is Marilyn.  Her previous loan was a big help to her business since she was able to buy needed items for the maintenance of their jeepney.  The loan also helped her to meet her household expenditures.

Marilyn would like to apply for another 30,000 PHP loan to buy spare parts and for maintenance of their jeepney unit.  She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart. 

Marilyn dreams of expanding her business and hopes that her family is always in good health.  She meets up with her co-fellowship* members every week to share stories of her work and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies. 

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: To pay for spare parts and maintenance of their jeepney unit.

loans.name: Ludy

texts.en:
This is Ludy, 50, resident of Bacoor, Cavite, Philippines.  She is married to Jaime, a construction worker, and she is a mother to her children.  She, together with her husband manage their household while operating the business.  At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.   

Ludy operates a variety store. In the Philippines, a variety store is basically a small convenience store, which retails groceries, toiletries and beverages piecemeal to the local neighborhood.  It is the place to go to buy one sachet of shampoo, a PHP 5 worth of cooking oil, or an egg.  She earns money by getting supplies at wholesale prices and selling by the piece.  Her store is located adjacent to her house.  Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community.  She earns a minimum of 500 Philippine Pesos (PHP) in sales every day.

To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a PHP 30,000 loan.  She will be utilizing the loan to buy groceries, toiletries, beverages and other products to add in her inventory.  She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business. 

Ludy hopes to be able to expand soon, just as she dreams to be able to give her family a good future through all her hard work in her business.  She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for grocery items, toiletries and beverages needed in her business

loans.name: Oscar Alexis

texts.es:
Oscar de 26 años de edad, estudio educación media, está acompañado su compañera de vida se dedica a los oficios del hogar, él tiene dos hijos los cuales estudian y viven en la misma casa con sus padres, ellos dependen de él.
Oscar se dedica a prestar servicio como cobrador, en una comercial, él tiene 9 años de laborar en dicha empresa, inicio como vendedor luego se ganó la confianza y paso hacer cobrador, además cultiva 7000 metros cuadrados de maíz, lo hace los fines de semana por su empleo que es de lunes a viernes.
Oscar con el crédito comprara material para hacerle mejoras a su vivienda, comprara 15 bolsas de cemento 500 ladrillos, 2 quintales de hierro y el pago de la mano de obra, esto será donde va invertir el crédito el cliente,  espera que sus hijos vivan en una casa digna y en buenas condiciones.
Oscar sueña en proyecciones de poder construir su vivienda y sacar adelante su familia poder ver crecer sus  hijos y prepararlos académicamente, pero sabe que esto lo lograra gracias al crédito y espera que Dios le de vida y salud para poder lograrlo.
texts.en:
Oscar is 26 years old and studied up until high school. His life partner works as a housewife and they have two children who study, live with them and are dependent on them. 

Oscar works as a collector for a sales representative. He has worked for the same company for nine years. He started as a vendor but later he gained their trust and was promoted to collector. He also spends his weekends cultivating 7000 square metres of corn, since he works at his job Monday to Friday. 

With this loan Oscar will buy materials to make home improvements. He will buy 15 bags of cement, 500 bricks, 2 quintals of iron and pay for the cost of labour. This is how this client will invest their loan. He hopes that his children will be able to live in a decent home in good condition. 

Oscar dreams of being able to build his home and bring up his family and of being able to watch his children grow and prepare them academically, however he knows that he will be able to achieve these goals thanks to the loan and he hopes that God will give him life and health to achieve them.

loans.use: to buy 15 bags of cement, 500 bricks, 2 quintals of iron and to pay for the cost of labour

loans.name: Felix's Group

texts.en:
Felix is a member of the Bidii farmers Group in the Busia District.  He is pictured here in a group of nine One Acre Fund group leader farmers.  The group leaders represent a total of 71 individual One Acre Fund farmers who are not pictured here.  Felix has been selected to act as the Kiva group representative and is standing on the right with his hand raised.  He and the other farmers represented in this group are each receiving ¼ acre of maize and ¼ acre of sorghum or millet. 

Each farmer is receiving an average input loan of 5,349 shillings for maize, millet and sorghum cultivation.  Felix is a reliable member of the community. He is married with five children.  Felix is 45 years old and has been working as a farmer for the last five years to support his family.  In addition to this, Felix is involved in the prayer group.  He described his harvest last year as one not with One Acre Fund.  He hopes that as a One Acre Fund farmer he is able to join the ranks of One Acre Fund farmers that have doubled their harvest in their first year of the program! 

Felix is now preparing to be a One Acre Fund farmer during the 2014 long rain season.  Felix joined One Acre Fund in order to get new farming methods and get fertilizer and hybrid seeds.  He also volunteered to be a group leader and Kiva representative.  Felix plans to use the money that he earns from his next harvest to send his children to school and save for the future.  He notes that working with One Acre Fund has lead to many benefits for One Acre Fund farmers.  Felix’s own life was improved because he has more farm training. 

Felix and the Bidii farmers Group need a loan to cover the initial costs of purchasing the seeds and fertilizer through One Acre Fund.  One Acre Fund will repay the Kiva loan on behalf of the farmers through the profits from the farmers’ harvests.  One Acre Fund prepurchases the seeds and fertilizer when prices are low and passes the cost savings to the farmers.  Throughout the planting and harvesting season, One Acre Fund also provides training and support to the farmers as they make payments back to One Acre Fund.  With support from One Acre Fund and your loan, these farmers will have a chance at a successful harvest, increased profits and improved lives. The field officer is also included in the photo and is standing on the left of the photo.

loans.use: to provide Kenyan farmers with increased access to hybrid seed and fertilizer for harvesting maize, millet, and sorghum.

loans.name: Mildrey Johanna

texts.es:
Mildrey es una mujer emprendedora, dinámica y perseverante; madre soltera de una hija de 7 años de edad, por quien lucha incansablemente para sacarla adelante.
Hoy en día, a sus 25 años de edad, ya tiene su propio taller de confección, en el que presta el servicio a terceros; el oficio lo aprendió desde muy joven gracias a las enseñanzas de una tía que tenía un taller, allí además de aprender el arte, también obtuvo experiencia mientras trabajaba; un tiempo después comenzó a trabajar en grandes empresas de confección, poco a poco fue ahorrando dinero para comprar sus propias máquinas y en los tiempos libres hacía algunos trabajos pequeños, hasta que hace 1 año tomó la decisión de independizarse y dedicarse de lleno a su propio taller, obteniendo muy buenos resultados, gracias a ello, genera un empleo directo y se gana la vida para dar sustento a su hija.
El crédito que solicita es un apoyo para comprar insumos al por mayor (telas, hilos, botones, entre otros), esto le permitirá cumplir con la entrega de los pedidos de manera oportuna, fidelizando así a sus clientes y mejorando los ingresos.
Mildrey tiene como proyecto a mediano plazo la ampliación de su taller, con el fin de generar más oportunidades de empleo a madres cabeza de hogar y así contribuir para mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y la de sus colaboradoras.
texts.en:
Mildrey is an enterprising, dynamic and persevering woman. She is the single mother of a 7 year old girl, for whom she fights tirelessly to get ahead. 

Today, at 25 years old, she has her own sewing shop, where she works for third parties. She learned the trade since she was very young, thanks to the teachings of an aunt who had a workshop. There she also learned about art. She also got experience wile working. Some time later, she started to work in big sewing workshops. Little by little, she saved money to buy her own machines. In her free time she would do small jobs until 1 year later, she decided to become independent and work in her own workshop full time. She obtained very good results. Thanks to that, she generates direct employment and earns a living to support her daughter.

The loan she is taking out is to help buy materials wholesale (fabric, thread, buttons, and more). This will allow her to fill orders in a timely way, earning her customers' loyalty and improving her income.

Mildrey's medium term project is to expand her workshop in order to generate more employment opportunities for single mothers and thus contribute to her family's better quality of life and that of her helpers.

loans.use: to buy materials wholesale (fabric, thread, buttons, and more).

loans.name: Dora Margarita

texts.es: Dora de 47 años de edad se dedica desde hace 20 años a la elaboración y venta de piñatas, su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia, posee clientela fija ya que su producto lo elabora con materiales de muy buena calidad y a precios accesibles, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra cubrir algunos gastos de su hogar, vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus cuatro hijos, los tres mayores trabajan y le ayudan en los gastos del hogar. Doña Dora esta solicitando a INTEGRAL un préstamo para poder comprar los materiales necesarios para seguir elaborando las piñatas como: alambre, papel de todo tipo y colores, pegamento, papel de diario, etc. y así obtener mas ganancias para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Dora is 47 years old. For 20 years, she has worked making and selling piñatas. She has her business located in her residence. She has regular customers because she makes her product out of very good quality materials and sells at accessible prices. With what she earns from her sales she is able to cover some of the household expenses. She lives in her own house with her husband and their four children. The three oldest work and help with the household expenses. Dora is asking INTEGRAL for a loan to be able to buy the materials she needs to keep making the piñatas, such as: wire, all kinds and colors of paper, glue, newspaper, etc. This way, she can make more income to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy wire, all kinds and colors of paper, glue and newspaper.

loans.name: Benon

texts.en: Benon a farmer who grows and sells onions; he lives in Fort Portal, Uganda.  He is a 34 years old, married with children.  He opted for onion growing from 2004 to earn a living and utilizes the available market in his area.  His dream is to diversify his business and to have a healthy family despite the challenge of price fluctuations.  Benon is requesting for a loan to buy land for onion planting.

loans.use: to buy land for onion planting.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more chicken, chicken feet, dried fish, etc. for the business.

loans.name: Martha Liliam

texts.es:
Martha es una joven de 25 años de edad, quien tiene un grado de escolaridad de primaria incompleta, madre soltera de 3 hijos quienes son menores de edad y estudian en la escuela de la comunidad viviendo es su casa de habitación sus padres, ella y sus hijos. En familia se desempeñan en la siembra y cultivo de café, granos básicos en pequeña escala el cual le sirve de sustento a su familia y en ocasiones vende parte de su producción. Doña Martha se ha dedicado a este rubro desde hace 4 años ya que este tipo de actividad viene de generaciones, el grano de café lo vende por medio de intermediarios ya que así se evitan hacer el gasto de trasladarlo a las bodegas en donde es almacenado y vendido. Sus cultivos están ubicados aproximadamente a un kilómetro de distancia desde su casa de habitación al cual se trasladan en autobús de ruta de la zona.
Su mayor meta es que sus hijos obtengan un mejor patrimonio dejando un techo digno y tierras para que las puedan trabajar. Su sueño es que sus hijos se gradúen de la universidad y considera que con el apoyo que hoy en día solicita a la cooperativa COMIXMUL podrá lograr que este proyecto se haga realidad ya que su necesidad en este momento es poder darle asistencia a sus cultivos de café comprando mediante la compra de 8 QQ de urea, 8 QQ de fórmula 12-24-12 y 8 QQ de fórmula 18-26-0.
texts.en:
Martha is a young 25 year old woman who studied one incomplete year of primary school. She is a single mother to three children who are underage and study at a school in the community. They live with her and her parents. As a family they work sowing and growing coffee and staple crops on a small scale which help her to support her family and sometimes to sell part of her produce. 

Martha has worked in this area for four years as this work has been handed down over the generations. The coffee beans are sold through intermediaries because in this way she avoids the cost of transporting the beans to warehouses where they are stored and sold. Her crops are located approximately one kilometer away from her home which she is able to get to by taking the local bus.

Martha’s main goal is for her children to inherit a better life by leaving them with a decent roof over their heads and land that they can work. Her dream is for her children to graduate from university. She believes that with the support that she has applied for today from the COMIXMUL cooperative she will be able to make this plan a reality. What she needs right now is to help her coffee crops along by buying  8 quintals of urea, 8 quintals of 12-24-12 formula and 8 quintals of 18-26-0 formula.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies to help her coffee crops along

loans.name: Katherine Carla

texts.es: Katherine es madre soltera de una niña de año y medio que queda al cuidado de su abuela mientras ella estudia y trabaja. Katherine trabaja en un centro comercial como practicante de administración, que es lo que estudia en la universidad Católica Sede Sapientiae,se encuentra en el quinto ciclo de la carrera,decidió estudiar esta carrera por que tiene planes futuros en administrar su propia empresa.Katherine va a utilizar el préstamo para pagar la Universidad ya que su mayor sueño es terminar pronto la carrera para lograr sus metas trazadas y poder darle a su hija tiempo y dedicación. Katherine a vencido cualquier obstáculo que se a interpuesto en su camino profesional,ya que su motivación es su pequeña hijita. Katherine esta feliz de que la ayuden personas que ella no conoce y agradece a KIVA por todo el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Katherine is a single mother to a daughter who is a year and a half and is cared for by her grandmother while Katherine studies and works. Katherine works in a shopping centre as an administration assistant, which is what she studied at the Catholic university Sede Sapientiae. She is now in the fifth semester of her course. She decided to study this course because she has future plans to administer her own business. 

Katherine will use this loan to pay for university. Her greatest dream is to finish her course soon to achieve the goals she has set out and give time and dedication to her daughter. She has overcome every obstacle that has been placed in her professional path because her little girl is her motivation. 

Katherine is happy that people who don’t know her are helping her and she is grateful to Kiva for all the help they have given her.

loans.use: to pay for university

loans.name: Confiance Group

texts.fr:
CONFIANCE  est un groupe de l’association BENKADI de KOMO, dans la commune rurale  de TIELE. Il regroupe 5 femmes qui se sont connues à travers des liens de parenté et de voisinage. Elles ont une moyenne d’âge de 36 ans. Mariées avec en  moyenne trois enfants, elles mènent différentes activités  telles l’achat vente de condiments à l’image de MARIAM qui est la seule  personne assise de la photo. Elles vivent dans des grandes familles traditionnelles à KOMO dans la  Sous Préfecture de BAGUINEDA (Région de Koulikoro, République du Mali). 
Elles sont dans le petit commerce depuis plusieurs années et sont très sollicitées dans leurs activités d’achat vente de condiments : poivre, tomate,  oignon, choux, etc.
Dans le souci de satisfaire le besoin croissant de leurs clientèles, les membres du groupe ont décidé d’intégrer le programme crédit de Soro Yiriwaso il y a trois ans. Elles sont à leur quatrième  prêt solidaire. 
MARIAM, qui est la présidente du groupe et très connue à KOMO  et excelle dans la vente de condiments. Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter de condiments alimentaires de différentes sortes (poivre, tomate, oignon, choux).  Elle s’approvisionne à BAMAKO et sur place  auprès des grossistes  et vend ses condiments à KOMO, en détail, au comptant et à crédit, à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes.   
Elle espère sur un bénéfice mensuel de 40.000FCFA somme qui lui  permettra de rembourser le prêt et de réinvestir dans son activité d’achat vente de condiments.
texts.en:
