Siempre se ha dedicado a la agricultura de maíz y frijoles, y hace 15 años cultiva café. Esta producción la vende en la misma zona y mercado local. El préstamo que solicita es por 20,000 Lempiras para comprar fertilizantes y limpieza de la finca de café para darle asistencia y obtener mejor cosecha. Su plan a futuro es utilizar las ganancias para comprar un vehículo de trabajo.
texts.en: Don Pablo is 52 years old and lives with his common-law wife. They have 6 children and live in Nueva Frontera, Santa Bárbara. He has always farmed corn and beans. Fifteen years ago, he began growing coffee. He produces coffee in the same area and sells it in local markets. He requesting this loan for 20,000 Lempiras to buy fertilizers and to clean his farmland to give assistance to his crops and to reap a better harvest. His future plan is to use his profits to buy a work vehicle.

loans.use: to fertilize and clean his farmland for coffee cultivation.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita works hard to support her family. She is single and has a buy-and-sell firewood and charcoal business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for two years now.

Teresita requested a PHP 8,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stock of firewood and charcoal to sell.

In the future, Teresita would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of firewood and charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Alfrida

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Alfrida works hard to support her family.

She has a bakery business in the Philippines, and earns additional income from food vending. Alfrida is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF to purchase additional ingredients like flour, sugar and salt for her bakery business.

Alfrida has been sustaining her business activities through her past three loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional ingredients like flour, sugar and salt for her bakery business.

loans.name: Evella

texts.en:
Evella is a hard-working entrepreneur who has a food vending business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 29,000 through NWTF to purchase ingredients like meat, vegetables and spices for her food vending business.

Evella has been in this business for seven years. Evella earns additional income from a general store.

Evella has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients like meat, vegetables and spices for her food production business

loans.name: Juan Raul

texts.es:
Juan Raúl vive en la ciudad de Oropesa al sur de Cusco y él continua haciendo el  servicio de transporte en su propio taxi, el cubre la ruta que va de la ciudad de Oropesa  a la ciudad del Cusco y viceversa. En esta oportunidad Juan Raúl requiere el préstamo para hacer mantenimiento del carro o sea va arreglar los frenos. 

Juan Raúl sigue perteneciendo al banco comunal “RICCHARIY PURIRISUN” de la Asociación Arariwa y se encuentra agradecido por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Juan Raúl lives in the town of Oropesa located south of the city of Cusco. He continues to do a shuttle service with his own taxi driving the route between Oropesa and Cusco. This time, Juan Raúl requests a loan for vehicle maintenance. He is going to fix the brakes. 

Juan Raúl still belongs to the communal bank "RICCHARIY PURIRISUN" of Arariwa. He is grateful for the opportunity he is being offered. He agrees to comply with the schedule for repayment.

loans.use: to fix his taxi's brakes.

loans.name: Gladis

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de panaderia,la socia prepara panes,pasteles y tortas,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 8:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de panaderia.La socia solicita el credito para comprar insumos como harina,mantequilla y huevos.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member works in a bakery shop preparing bread, pastries, and cakes. She has worked from 8 am until 8 pm for many years in this shop, and it is going very well for her. Her dream is to expand this bakery business and is asking for the loan to buy supplies, such as flour, butter, and eggs. 

The member is very happy about this loan and pledges to complete the payments from her agreement.

loans.use: to buy supplies such as flour, butter, and eggs.

loans.name: Aimie

texts.en: Aimie wants to improve her family's living situation. She studies in a university taking business administration courses. She has six siblings and her parents earn income from their farm. She wants to help the family to augment their income and through her higher education is assured to achieve this.With her GDMPC microfinance loan, she will pay her tuition fees. She is determined to finish her courses, get a good job and help her siblings also receive a good education in the future.

loans.use: to pay school tuition fees

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for the cooking gas package so that he can provide three courses of meals to his family

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more merchandise, like beverages, bread, candies, rice, etc.

loans.name: Alejandrina

texts.es:
Alejandrina vive en la ciudad de Oropesa al sur del Cusco y continua  con su actividad económica principal que es la elaboración y venta de panes “Chuta”, ella sigue teniendo su propio horno donde prepara panes “Chutas”. 

En esta oportunidad Alejandrina requiere el préstamo para comprar insumos como por ejemplo sacos de harina y sacos de azúcar.  

Alejandrina se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.

(El pan CHUTA es un típico pan de la ciudad del cusco, caracterizado por ser un pan gigante que mide aproximadamente unos 30 x30 cm y 4 a 4 cm de grueso y por ser un pan muy delicioso, tanto así que muchos turistas gustan llevar una muestra a sus familiares como obsequio, a fin de que puedan estos saborear un poquito de la magia que envuelve a la ciudad imperial del cusco.)
texts.en:
Alejandrina lives in the city of Oropesa south of Cusco, and she continues with her principal economic activity, which is making and selling “Chuta” bread. She still has her own oven where she prepares her “Chuta” bread. 

On this occasion, Alejandrina needs a loan to purchase supplies such as, for example, sacks of wheat flour and sacks of sugar. 

Alejandrina is very grateful for the opportunity offered through this means and, thus, she is committed to complying with her corresponding payments on schedule.

(Chuta bread is a typical product of the city of Cusco, and is characterized as a gigantic loaf that measures approximately some 30 x 30 cm and 4 x 4 cm thick. It is a very delicious bread, so much so that many tourists like to carry home a sample as a gift for their families, so that they can taste a bit of the magic that surrounds the imperial city of Cusco.)

loans.use: buy sacks of sugar and sacks of flour to make a popular bread typical of Cusco.

loans.name: Leonidas Rosa

texts.es: Don Leónidas, tiene 59 años de edad, vive con su esposa y dos hijos en una aldea que pertenece a Nueva Frontera, Santa Bárbara. Anteriormente se dedicaba a la ganadería y  hace 20 años aproximadamente se ha dedicado a la agricultura, cultiva maíz, frijol y café. La producción que saca la vende en la casa y en el mercado local. Ha decidido solicitar un préstamo por 20,000 lempiras para comprar fertilizantes y limpiar la finca de café, par darle buen mantenimiento y sacar mejor cosecha. El tiene como meta comprar un terreno para cultivar mas café.
texts.en: Leónidas is 59 years old and lives with his wife and two children in a small village that is part of Nueva Frontera, Santa Barbara. Previously, he worked with livestock, and now it has been 20 years since he started working in agriculture, growing corn, beans, and coffee. The crops that he harvests are sold from his house and in a local market. He has decided to ask for a loan for 20,000 HNL to buy fertilizer and clean his coffee plantation, in order to keep it well-maintained and collect a greater harvest. He has the goal of purchasing land to grow more coffee plants.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and clean his coffee fields

loans.name: Juan Maria

texts.es: Juan, tiene 23 años de edad, es soltero, tiene un hijo, vive en una aldea del municipio de Gracias Lempira. Desde joven se ha dedicado a la agricultura con su padre, lleva 10 años de cultivar café. El cultivo lo tiene en la zona montañosa. Esta producción la vende en el mercado local de la zona. El préstamo que esta solicitando es el segundo ciclo de préstamo y es por 6,000 lempiras para comprar fertilizantes y dar asistencia para mejorar la producción. Su meta es ampliar el cultivo, ayudar a sus padres y superarse personalmente.
texts.en: Juan, 23, is single, has a son, and lives in a hamlet in the town of Gracias, Lempira. Since he was young, he has worked as a farmer with his father. He has spent 10 years cultivating coffee in the mountainous region. He sells the coffee he produces in the local markets. The loan he is requesting is his second. He is requesting 6,000 Lempiras to buy fertilizer to help his crops grow and improve production. His goal is to expand his farm, help his parents, and improve himself.

loans.use: to fertilize his coffee crops.

loans.name: Martin

texts.es: El señor Martin tiene veintitrés años de edad, es una persona trabajadora y se dedica a la agricultura, desde que era niño aprendió el trabajo de la tierra y pastoreo del ganado de sus padres. Cuando su padre falleció, él tuvo que encargarse de los cultivos, terrenos donde se produce todo tipo de hortalizas y cereales que son comercializados en las ferias que hay en la población que están un poco lejos del lugar en el que vive, pero con la ayuda de su ganado de carga logra sacar hacia la carretera sus productos, también se dedica al engorde de ganado bovino y ovino para su posterior venta. Proviene de una familia humilde, se caracteriza por ser responsable y quiere sacar adelante a su familia, actualmente solicita un crédito para comprar materiales agrícolas; al ver las circunstancias en las que se encuentra quiere diversificar su producción ya que el lugar donde vive es una zona agrícola y podría producir legumbres, cereales y hortalizas. De esta forma lograra aumentar sus ingresos y proporcionar mejores condiciones de vida a su familia.
texts.en: Martin is 23 years old.  He is a hard worker, engaged in farming.  As a child, his parents taught him how to work the land and graze the cattle.   When his father died, he had to take charge of the crops, lands where he grows all types of vegetables and cereals. He sells the products at the markets in the village, which are a bit far from the place where he lives, but he manages to get his products on the road with the help of his cattle as beasts of burden.  He also fattens cattle and sheep for subsequent sale.  He comes from a humble family, known for being responsible and wants to get his family ahead.  He is requesting the current loan to purchase farm supplies. Upon seeing the circumstances in which he finds himself, he wishes to diversify his production because the area where he lives is an agricultural zone, and he could produce legumes, cereals, and vegetables.  In this way, he will manage to increase his income and provide his family with better living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase farm supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for a clean cooking gas package in order to avoid the ill effects of charcoal

loans.name: Saturnino

texts.en: The member Juan works in a hardware store and sells various construction materials, such as cement, nails, and tools. The member works from 8 am until 7 pm and has been with this company for many years. His dream is to expand this hardware store and is asking for a loan to buy nails, cement, and tools. Juan is happy about this loan and promises to complete the payments from his agreement.

loans.use: To buy nails, cement, and tools.

loans.name: Petronila

texts.es:
La socia Petronila se sigue dedicando al negocio de fotocopiadora y tambien sigue organizando bautizos y cumpleaños,la socia en su negocio de fotocopiadora trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de fotocopiadora.La socia solicita el credito para comprar papel y tinta para la fotocopiadora.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Petronila continues with her photo-copying business and also still organizes baptisms and birthdays.  She works in her photo-copying business from 8:00 a.m. to 7:00 p.m. She already has several years in this business and her dream is to expand her business.  She is requesting the loan to purchase paper and ink for the photo-copier.  Petronila is happy for the loan and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to purchase paper and ink for the photo-copier.

loans.name: Beverlyn

texts.en:
Beverlyn is a widowed woman with four children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Beverlyn is 56 years old and two of her children are still in school.

Beverlyn has a firewood-vending business in the Philippines. Beverlyn requested a PHP 15,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more stock of firewood to sell to her customers.

Beverlyn has been in this business for five years. Beverlyn would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more stock of firewood to sell to her customers

loans.name: Virgen De Caacupe Group

texts.es:
El grupo se llama Virgen de Caacupé; está en su ciclo número 3  del programa de comité de mujeres, es un grupo que está aprendiendo a trabajar juntas y a ayudarse las unas a las otras y con mucho sacrificio están mejorando sus vidas.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Dominga quien se dedica a la Venta de Comidas en su casa, y también a la venta de bebidas,  se debe destacar el trabajo de la señora, ya que es muy luchadora y trabajadora. Comenta que todos los días empieza a trabajar desde muy tempranas horas ya que siempre hace sus comidas muy frescas, y eso es lo que gusta a sus clientes.
La Sra. Solicita de este préstamo para la compra de los ingredientes para la elaboración de las comidas carne, pan para hamburguesas, bebidas en general, entre otros; lo que le ayudará a concretar su plan de negocio, el cual le ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
The Virgen de Caacupé group is in its third cycle with the Women’s Committee program.  This group, which is learning to work together and help each other, is improving their lives with much sacrifice.

Dominga is one of the members.  She sells food at her house.  She also sells drinks.  This woman’s work stands out because she is very tenacious and hard-working.  She says that she starts work very early every day.  This is because she always makes very fresh food.  This is what her customers like.

She is requesting this loan to buy ingredients to make the food.  She will buy meat, bread for hamburgers, and general drinks, among other things.  This will help to firm up her business plan, which will help her improve her income.

loans.use: to buy meat, bread for hamburgers, and general drinks, among other things.

loans.name: Livia

texts.es:
La socia Livia se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de ropa,la ropa lo vende en forma independiente y productos de primera necesidad cocmo arroz,azucar y leche,la socia trabaja en su tienda de abarrotes desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 10:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio de le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender la ropa.La socia solicita el credito para comprar pantalones,blusas y chompas.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Livia continues her clothing sales business.  She sells the clothing independently, and also sells basic necessities such as rice, sugar, and milk.  Livia works in her grocery store from 8:00 a.m. to 10:00 p.m.  She already has several years in this business and it is going very well.  Her dream is to have a space where she can sell the clothing.  She is requesting the loan to purchase pants, blouses, and sweaters.  She is happy to receive the loan and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to purchase pants, blouses, and sweaters.

loans.name: Berta Lidia

texts.es: Doña Berta, tiene 42 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene 3 hijos, reside en una aldea de Nueva Frontera, Santa Bárbara. Siempre se ha dedicado al cultivo de maíz y frijoles y hace 3 años decidió cultivar café el cual vende en oro en la misma zona o mercado local. El préstamo es el segundo ciclo y es por 20,000 Lempiras y lo invertirá en la compra de fertilizantes y limpieza de la finca para darle asistencia y sacar mejor producción. Su meta es crecer económicamente y darle un mejor nivel de vida a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Doña Berta is 42 years old.  She is a single mother and has three children.  She lives in the village of Nueva Frontera, Santa Bárbara.  

She has always worked growing corn and beans, and three years ago she decided to grow coffee.  She can sell the coffee in El Oro, which is in the area, or in the local market.  

This loan is her second cycle and is for 20,000 Lempiras.  She will invest it in the purchase of fertilizers and in cleaning up the coffee farm to help it out and get a better yield.  Her goal is to grow financially and give a higher quality of life to her children.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and to clean up her coffee farm.

loans.name: Micaela Teresita

texts.es:
Micaela es una señora casada de 54 años de edad, vive junto a sus cuatro  hijos ambos mayores de edad y viven en el Departamento de Suchitepequez.
Ella es una mujer que cada día se esfuerza por salir adelante junto a su familia. Comenta que actualmente se dedica a la elaboración de güipiles y fajas, como también a la compraventa de ropa típica. Eligió esta actividad porque no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, ya que sus padres no contaban con los recursos económicos suficientes. Ahora cuenta con varios años de experiencia en esta actividad, que es bastante productiva en cuanto a la obtención de recursos económicos, lo cual les ha ayudado a mejorar su economía.
Ella  ahora se ha dado cuenta que cada vez este producto es más rentable y es por ello que está solicitando un préstamo de Q 4,000.00 para la compra de hilos y ropa típica, para ofrecerles una gran variedad de estilos y colores a sus clientes. 
Doña Micaela sueña con ampliar su negocio para mejorar sus ingresos y así poder comprar un terreno, para que en un futuro sus hijos tengan un lugar en donde vivir.
texts.en:
Micaela is a married 54-year-old woman. She lives with her four children, two of whom are adults, in the Department of Suchitepequez.

She is a woman who strives everyday to help her family get by. She is currently working on manufacturing blouses and sashes and selling traditional clothing. She chose this activity because she did not have an opportunity to study since her parents did not have sufficient financial resources. She now has several years of experience in her business which is quite productive in terms of earnings. She has helped improve her family's economy. 

She has noticed that her products are increasingly profitable which is why she is requesting a loan of 4,000 Guatemalan Quetzales to purchase thread and traditional clothing to offer a variety of styles and colors to her customers.

Micaela dreams of expanding her business to improve her income so that she can buy land where her children can live in the future.

loans.use: to purchase thread and traditional clothing.

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es:
La socia Luz Marina se sigue dedicando al negocio de tienda de abarrotes,la socia vende arroz,azucar,leche y galletas,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 10:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 7 años en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes.La socia solicita el credito para comprar arroz,azucar,leche y huevos.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Borrower Luz Marina is still devoted to her grocery store business. She sells rice, sugar, milk, and cookies. She works from 8 in the morning until 10 at night. She has already been in business for over 7 years and is doing very well. She dreams to expand the store. She has requested a loan to buy rice, sugar, milk, and eggs. Luz Marina is happy to have the loan and agrees to comply with her share of repayments.

loans.use: to purchase rice, sugar, milk, and eggs for her grocery store.

loans.name: Humberto

texts.es:
El socio Humberto se sigue dedicando al negocio de imprenta,el socio trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m,el socio ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le v amuy bien,el sueño del socio es ampliar el negocio de imprenta.El socio solicita el credito para comprar tarjetas,folletos y facturas.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Humberto continues with his printing business.  He works from 8:00 a.m. until 7:00 p.m.  He already has several years in this business and it is going very well.  He dreams of expanding his printing business.  He is requesting the loan to purchase blank cards, brochures, and invoices.  He is happy to receive the loan and promises to make his payments on time.

loans.use: to purchase cards, brochures, and invoices.

loans.name: Benito

texts.es:
El socio Benito se sigue dedicando al trabajo como maestro de construccion,el socio construye casas,edificios entre otros,el socio trabaja desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,el socio ya tiene varios en este trabajo,por medio de este trabajo quiere salir adelante,el sueño del socio es tene un negocio propio como una empresa de construccion.El socio solicita el credito para comprar madera,herramientas y cemento.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Group member Benito continues working as a master of construction.  He builds houses and buildings, among others.  He works from 7:00 a.m. until 6:00 p.m.  He has already worked a number of years in this field.  He wants to get ahead through this work.  His dream is to have his own business, such as a construction company.  He is asking for this loan to buy wood, tools, and cement.

Benito is happy to have the loan and is committed to completing his scheduled payments.

loans.use: to buy wood, tools, and cement.

loans.name: Vegie

texts.en:
Vegie is studying toward a B.S. in Accountancy in a university and wants to improve his living situation in the future.  According to him, ambition is the path to success.  He was determined to finish his course in order to gain a better job.  He used his previous loan from GDMPC to cover the costs for his school expenses. 
 
Recently, he borrowed a loan again to pay his tuition fees this current semester.  He is thankful to GDMPC for being a part of his journey.

loans.use: to pay his tuition fees this current semester

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
El socio Juan se sigue dedicando al negocio de servicio de taxi,el socio trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,el socio ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño del socio es tener un carro nuevo.El socio solicita el credito para comprar llantas para su carro.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member Juan works for a taxi service from 8 am until 6 pm. He has worked for this business for many years, and it is going very well for him. His dream is to have a new car. The member is asking for this loan to buy rims for his car. 

Juan is very happy to receive this loan and promises to make the payments per his agreement.

loans.use: to buy rims for his car.

loans.name: Jaime

texts.es:
El socio Jaime sigue trabajando como maestro de construccion,el socio construye casas,edificios entre otros,el socio trabaja desde las 5:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,el socio ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño del socio es tener su empresa de construccion.El socio solicita el credito para comprar cemento y herramientas.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Group member Jaime continues to work as a master of construction.  He builds houses and buildings, among others.  He works from 5:00 a.m. until 6:00 p.m.  He has already worked a number of years in the business, and it is going well for him.  His dream is to have a construction company.  He is asking for a loan to buy cement and tools.

Jaime is happy to have the loan and is committed to completing his scheduled payments.

loans.use: to buy cement and tools

loans.name: Editha

texts.en:
Editha is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a general store business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 13,000 through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store.

Editha has been in this business for four years. Editha earns more income from food vending.

Editha has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store

loans.name: Jose Hector

texts.es: José Héctor, tiene 39 años de edad, es casado, tiene 5 hijos y vive en una aldea del municipio de Ilama Santa Bárbara.  El lleva aproximadamente 21 años de dedicarse a la agricultura, actualmente cultiva café, banano y vende plantas de café. La producción la vende en el mercado local.  Ha decidido solicitar un segundo préstamo que es por 15,000 Lempiras para fertilizar y darle mantenimiento de desagüe y limpieza a su finca de café y banano para poder sacar mejor producción y de calidad. Su meta es incrementar la producción e ingresos y ayudar a sus hijos con la educación.
texts.en: José Héctor is 39 years old, and married with five children.  He lives in a village in the Ilama Santa Bárbara district.  He has been engaged in farming for about 21 years, and currently grows coffee and bananas, and sells coffee plants.  He sells his produce at the local market.  He has decided to request a second loan for 15,000 Lempiras to buy fertilizer, and to maintain the draining and cleaning of his coffee and banana plantations to yield better production and quality.  His goal is to increase production and income and help his children with their education.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and clean his coffee crops.

loans.name: Kimsren's Group

texts.en:
Kimsren is a 52-year-old widowed mother from Kampong Cham province. She has been involved in tobacco planting for around thirty years. This is the only business the family has. On average, they earn around $25 a day, and after cutting off necessary expenses, they could save about $10 a day. 

Kimsren is now leading a big group of five members to request loans from VisionFund Cambodia. Kimsren is planning to use her loan portion to buy fertilizers for her tobacco farm. 

As always, she hopes to make more profit so that she can continue supporting her grandchild in school.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for her tobacco plants.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Kampong Siem district

loans.name: Mirian Josefa

texts.es:
Doña Mirian es una mujer de 52 años de edad casada y madre de 1 hijo quien está en hogar a parte. Ella tiene un grado de educación de primaria completo el cual pudo cursar con mucho esfuerzo y sacrificio y no pudo continuar en la secundaria por falta de ayuda económica ya que sus padres son de bajos recursos por lo cual las entradas de efectivo las distribuían realizando la compra de los alimentos para el sustento de su familia. Ella se dedica a la venta de granos básicos y café siendo sus padres quienes le enseñaran dicha actividad la cual ejerce hace muchos años y que hasta hoy en día sigue practicando en compañía de su esposo siendo este el único medio de ingreso y sustento para su familia. 
Actualmente ella solicita ayuda para la compra de fertilizante y abono para sus cultivos de café y granos básicos (maíz y frijol) el cual les permitirá mantener limpio de plagas y de enfermedades las cuales son dañinas para sus cultivos.
En un futuro planea seguir aumentando su cultivó de café para de esa manera generar más ingresos que le permitan seguir invirtiendo en su producción de café ya que uno de los más grandes desafíos es el constante aumento y el alza de los precios de los insumos mismos que son de gran ayuda para que la producción se pueda aprovechar en un 100% esto permitirá fortalecer el patrimonio para su familia.
texts.en: Mirian is a 52-year-old married woman with one child who lives elsewhere.  She was educated, with a lot of work and sacrifice, through elementary school, but lacked the money to continue on to secondary school.  Her parents were not well off so their income was spent on food to sustain the family.  Mirian sells staple crops and coffee, an economic activity she learned from her parents and which she has practiced for many years and continues today, along with her husband.  This is the only income and form of sustenance her family has.  Now she requests help to buy fertilizers for her coffee, corn, and bean crops, which will allow her to keep them free from pests and disease which are damaging to the crops.  In the future she plans to continue increasing her coffee production so she can generate more income to continue investing in growing coffee.  One of the biggest challenges is the constant increase and rising in price of the inputs which are very helpful in taking full advantage of production.  This will allow her to strengthen her family's assets.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs for her coffee, corn, and bean crops

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es:
La socia Sonia tiene 33 años,es casada y tiene 6 hijos,la socia se dedica al negocio de venta de condimentos son preparados como salsas que usa para preparar platos al horno,la socia vende ajos molidos,ajis molidos entre otros condimentos,la socia ya tiene 5 años en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los condimentos.La socia solicita el credito para comprar condimentos.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Group member Sonia is 33 years old.  She is married and has six children.  

She works selling prepared condiments such as sauces used to prepare baked dishes.  She sells ground garlic paste and ají pepper paste, among others.  She has been running this business for five years now, and it is going very well for her.  She is asking for this loan to buy condiments.

Sonia’s dream is to have a small shop where she can sell her condiments.  She is happy to have the loan and is committed to completing her payments.

loans.use: to buy condiments.

loans.name: Odilma Yakelin

texts.es: Odilma, tiene 26 años de edad, esta madre soltera y vive con sus padres y un hijo, reside en una aldea que pertenece a Nueva Frontera, Santa Bárbara. Ella cuenta con una parcela de café desde hace 4 años, el café que produce lo vende en oro en la misma zona. Esta solicitando un segundo préstamo a ODEF por 6,000 lempiras para capitalizarse y darle mantenimiento al cultivo de café, comprara fertilizantes y para limpieza de la finca. Su plan es crecer con este negocio para tener mejor nivel de vida con su hijo y familia.
texts.en: Odilma is 26 years old, is a single mother, and lives with her parents and son. They reside in a small town that belongs to Nueva Frontera, Santa Bárbara. For four years, she has counted on a plot of land that produces coffee, which she sells in the same district. She is asking for a second loan from ODEF of 6,000 HNL to capitalize on and maintain her coffee crops by buying fertilizer and cleaning her farm. Her plan is to grow with this business in order to have a better quality of life with her son and family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and and cleaner for the coffee plantation.

loans.name: Chona

texts.en:
Chona is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a business selling coconut roofing in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 7,000 through NWTF to buy additional materials for her business.

Chona has been in this business for 10 years. Chona earns additional income from food vending.

Chona has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to school in the future.

loans.use: to buy additional materials for her coconut roofing business.

loans.name: Eloisa

texts.en:
As a married parent of 10 children, Eloisa works hard to support her family.

She has a broom-making business in the Philippines and earns additional income from her general store. Eloisa is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy additional materials like bamboo, wire, rope, etc. for her broom-making business.

Eloisa has been sustaining her business activities through her past six loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional materials like bamboo, wire, rope, etc. for her business

loans.name: Alfonso

texts.en:
Alfonso, age 73, is a senior cacao farmer and member of MMC. He, along with his wife Isabella, lives in the beautiful village of San Jose, Toledo District, in the Country of Belize. The couple raised their nine children, two of whom still live with them. Alfonso's wife Isabella helps with the cleaning of his cacao farm and fermentation of cacao beans. 

Alfonso became encouraged to do cacao farming by Hershey. Now he sees cacao as a beneficial crop and something that is generating income for his family. He has approximately 1,400 cacao trees that are planted in two separate plots. One of his plots has cacao trees that are 30 years of age, while the other plot sustains trees that are 15 years of age. In total, he cultivates approximately 4 acres of cacao trees that provide him a yield of 90 lbs. per week. 

Alfonso stated that his previous loan assisted him in having his farm properly cleaned. Due to his age and inability to move, he pays workers to generally clean and prune his cacao farm. He has seen a major improvement, with high-yielding production.

Alfonso is asking for the assistance of another loan to hire workers to properly keep his cacao farm generally clean. His wife Isabella enjoys harvesting when the farm is properly underbrushed.

The couple lives happily on the farm with their daughter, who is assisting them with harvesting and other day-to-day operations.

loans.use: to properly clean his 1,400 mature cacao trees.

loans.name: Fanny

texts.es:
La socia Fanny se sigue dedicando al negocio de crianza  de animales y tambien se dedica al negocio de agricultura donde siembra papa,la socia cria cuyes y gallinas los hace engordar y crecer y luego los vende en los diferentes lugares,la socia trabaja desde las 5:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,por medio de estos pequeños negocios la socia quiere sañir adelanteel sueño de la socia es amplair el negocio de crianza de animales.La socia solicita el credito para comprar cuyes y gallinas y alimentos para los animales.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member Fanny works in the businesses of raising animals and agriculture. She plants potatoes, raises guinea pigs and hens, raising them and fattening them to the point where they can be sold in various places. She works from 5 am until 6 pm. Among these small ventures, she wants to expand her business of raising animals. She is asking for this loan to buy guinea pigs, hens, and feed for the animals. 

The member is very happy to receive this loan and promises to make her payments as agreed.

loans.use:
La socia solicita el credito para comprar cuyes y gallinas y alimentos para los animales.
To buy guinea pigs, hens, and feed for the animals.

loans.name: Agayar

texts.en: Agayar is 29 years old and a single man. He is living with his parents in the Baku region. Agayar is a taxi driver. A while ago, his car was damaged and now he has applied to Komak for a loan of 800 AZN (Azerbaijan New Manat). With this loan, he wants to repair his car and to renew his work. He says he is thankful for the Kiva organization and the lenders. In the future, Agayar wants to get married

loans.use: to repair his car

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
La socia Juana se sigue dedicando al negocio de restaurant,la socia prepara diferentes platos como pollo al horno y sopas,la socia tambien vende chicha que es una bebida a base de maiz,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de restaurant.La socia solicita el credito para comprar insumos para cocinar como arroz,pollo,carne y verduras.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member Juana works in a restaurant and prepares various dishes, such as roasted chicken and soups. The member also sells chicha, which is a beverages made from corn. She works from 8 am until 7 pm, and has worked for this business for many years, which is going very well for her. Juana's dream is to expand her restaurant business, and she is asking for this loan to fulfill her dream. 

Juana is very happy to receive this loan and promises to make her payments as agreed.

loans.use: to buy cooking supplies, such as rice, chicken, meat, and vegetables.

loans.name: Analie

texts.en: Analie is 25 years old and lives with her parents. She is a university student studying business administration. In her free time, she finds ways to generate income. Analie participates in GDMPC's student loan program because her school fees are a financial difficulty. Currently, she is requesting a new loan to pay her tuition fees for this semester. In the future, she wants to be successful.

loans.use: to pay her tuition fees for the semester

loans.name: Santos Melbin

texts.es: Santos, tiene 34 años de edad,  vive en unión libre con su pareja con quien tiene 2 hijos, reside en el municipio de Azacualpa, Santa Bárbara. Santos siempre se ha dedicado al comercio, hace varios años inicio con la compra y venta de chatarra y artículos plásticos para reciclar. Estos artículos los vende a una fábrica de reciclaje. El préstamo que solicita es el segundo ciclo y es por 25,000 lempiras para comprar chatarra, aluminio, plásticos, hierro, cobre etc. en otros lugares para venderlos a la fábrica. Su sueño es superarse ser un gran empresario llegar a tener su propia empresa y darles calidad de vida a sus hijos y familia.
texts.en: Santos is 34 years old, and lives in a common-law relationship with his partner with whom he has two children.  He lives in the Azacualpa, Santa Bárbara district.  Santos has always been engaged in business.  Several years ago, he started buying and selling scrap iron and plastics to recycle.  He sells these articles to a recycling plant.  He is in his second loan cycle and is requesting a loan of 25,000 Lempiras to purchase scrap iron, aluminum, plastics, iron, copper, and other items in other places to sell to the plant.  His dream is to succeed and become a great businessman, have his own company, and provide quality of life to his children and family.

loans.use: to purchase scrap iron, aluminum, plastics, iron, copper, etc. for resale.

loans.name: Maranatha Group

texts.fr: Madame Mwamini est présidente dans Maranatha, un groupe de crédit. Femme forte et entrepreneur, elle est âgée de 45 ans et mère de 9 enfants qui étudient tous. Elle est mariée à un menuisier. La cliente est une vendeuse des poissons frais depuis 1989. Le nouveau prêt servira à acheter 400 poissons frais. Son vouloir est d’acheter une parcelle.Ainsi, elle remercie Hekima de soutenir les femmes.
texts.en: Ms. Mwamini is the president of Maranatha, a loan group. A strong woman and an entrepreneur, she is 45 years old and the mother of nine children, who are all students. She is married to a furniture-maker. This client has been a vendor of fresh since 1989. This new loan will be used to purchase 400 fresh fish. Her wish is to buy a plot of land. So she thanks Hekima for supporting women.

loans.use: to purchase 400 fresh fish

loans.name: Emeli

texts.en:
Emeli is 44 years old and married with two children.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Emeli is borrowing PHP 18,000 through NWTF to purchase feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Emeli has been raising pigs for 25 years and earns additional income from vegetable vending.

She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream of saving money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Imelda

texts.en:
Imelda is a widowed woman with five children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Imelda is 50 years old and has one child who is still in school.

Imelda has a buy and sell of peanuts business in the Philippines. Imelda requested a PHP 9,000 loan NWTF to buy more sacks of peanuts to sell to her customers.

Imelda has been in this business for 10 years. In the future, Imelda would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more sacks of peanuts to sell to her customers

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine, who has a live-in partner, works hard to support her family. For the past year she has been selling bananas and mangoes in the Philippines. 

Josephine has requested a PHP 5000 loan through NWTF to purchase more bananas to sell. She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more bananas to sell

loans.name: Kuña Aty Kyre’Y Group

texts.es:
El grupo Kuña Aty Kyre’y está en su ciclo número 10° Del programa de comité, son mujeres sacrificadas que se unieron para poder ayudar a sus familias. Ellas también están dentro del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de la pobreza para poder conocer la situación de cada una de ellas.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Myrian, quien se dedica a la venta de leche, con lo cual está ayudando a su familia. Ella comenta que todos los días empieza a trabajar desde muy temprano para que sus clientes tengan la leche para la hora del desayuno. Es una persona muy sacrificada que con esfuerzo está saliendo adelante.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de leche, con lo cual podrá cumplir con los pedidos de sus clientes, y de esa forma seguir mejorando sus condiciones de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
The group called "Kuña Aty Krye'y" is in its tenth cycle with this program committee. They are self-sacrificing women who came together to be able to help their families. They are also part of a program committee of women who are working on a survey of poverty elimination in order to know the situation of each woman. 

One of the partners is Myrian. She works in milk sales and is helping her family. She says that she begins work very early everyday so that her customers have milk for breakfast time. She is a self-sacrificing person who is getting ahead with a lot of effort. She is asking for this loan to invest it in the purchase of milk so she can fulfill her customers' orders and continue improving her living conditions and those of her family.

loans.use: to buy milk to sell.

loans.name: Célestine's Group

texts.fr: Ce groupe est composé de trois personnes qui résident dans le même quartier. La représentante du groupe, Célestine(celle qui a la main levée sur la photo),âgée de 40 ans a fréquenté l’école jusqu’au niveau secondaire. C’est la première fois que Célestine sollicite l’appui de ALIDé. Célestine est mariée à un mécanicien auto, nommé Jean Marie. Le couple a trois enfants, tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Célestine vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants. Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges familiales. Pour ce faire, Célestine vend des bijoux, des produits cosmétiques et des couches dans sa région depuis vingt cinq ans, ce qui lui permet de subvenir aux besoins de ses enfants et à ses propres besoins. Célestine s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans le but de renforcer son activité et de satisfaire la demande de sa clientèle, Célestine ensemble avec les membres de son groupe sollicitent un premier crédit auprès de ALIDé.
texts.en:
This group is composed of three persons who reside in the same district. The group's representative, Célestine (with her hand raised in the photo), is 40 years old and has a secondary school education. This is the first time that she has requested support from ALIDé. She is married to an auto mechanic named Jean Marie. The couple have three children, all in school and in their care. She lives together with her husband and children.

The couple jointly ensure that the diverse household expenses are covered. To do so, Célestine has been selling jewelry, cosmetics, and diapers in her region for 25 years. This enables her to meet the needs of her children and her own, too. She gets her supplies from a market in Benin. With the goal of bolstering her business and satisfying customer demands, Célestine, along with the other members of her group, is requesting an initial loan from ALIDé.

loans.use: to purchase jewelry, cosmetic products, and diapers

loans.name: Cristina

texts.es:
La socia Cristina se sigue dedicando al negocio de restaurant,la socia prepara diferentes platos como pollo al horno,lomo saltado y sopas,la socia trabaja desde las 9:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de restaurant.La socia solicita el credito para comprar carne,pollo y verduras para cocinar.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Cristina continues with her restaurant business.  She prepares various dishes such as baked chicken, "lomo saltado"[a popular Peruvian dish of stir-fried beef, potatoes, and tomatoes], and soups.  She works from 9:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m.  She has several years in this business and it is going well.  She dreams of expanding the restaurant.  She is requesting the loan to purchase meat, chicken, and vegetables for cooking.  She is happy to receive the loan and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to purchase meat, chicken, and vegetables.

loans.name: Lourdes

texts.en:
Lourdes is 39 years old and married with three children.

She earns a living by having a pig-fattening business in the Philippines. Lourdes is borrowing PHP 8,000 through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Lourdes has been in the pig-fattening business for 17 years and earns additional income from banana vending.

She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream of repairing and renovating her home.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy farming supplies in order to tend and maintain her coffee crops.

loans.name: Julio Cesar

texts.es:
Julio Cesar es una persona de 33 años, nacido en la ciudad de Sogamoso, de niño la  madre lo envió a la Ciudad de Bogotá pensando en un mejor futuro para él, allí creció junto a una parte de la familia, convirtiéndose en un hombre el cual hoy en día quiere un mejor proyecto de vida.
Es una persona trabajadora, un ser con empatía, ya que cuenta con la capacidad de conectar con las experiencias de otra persona, tiene el coraje de ponerse en el lugar del otro y mirarse a sí mismo con honestidad. Tiene una paciencia que con frecuencia cualquier persona perdería, porque cree que las cosas tendrían que ser perfectas.
Así mismo es una persona trabajadora, que labora actualmente y se siente un poco estancado a nivel  laboral, razón por la cual toma la decisión de ingresar a la Corporación de Educación Superior LAS MERCEDES.
Anterior a esta determinación, un día se fijó en  el alrededor y vio que  la vida le estaba brindando la oportunidad de estudiar y llegar a ser una persona llena de éxitos y fortalezas de las cuales podría explotar los grandes conocimientos, ganas y expectativas de llegar a la meta de una carrera. 
Para terminar les cuenta que las ganas de seguir adelante con este sueño, pone en las manos de kiva la decisión de ayudarle con el subsidio para que pueda cumplir el sueño que tiene, razón por la cual JULIO CESAR AGUDELO busca en kiva el apoyo
texts.en:
Julio Cesar is 33 years old and was born in the city of Sogamoso. When he was a boy, his mother sent him to Bogotá, thinking of a better future for him. There, he was raised by another part of the family to become a man who now wants a better trajectory in life. 

He is a hardworking person and an empathetic being, who counts on his capacity to connect with the experiences of others. He has the courage to put himself in other people's shoes and look at himself with honesty. He possesses the patience that, frequently, other people would have lost, because he believes that things would have to be perfect. 

Currently, he is a laborer and is tired of this type of work, which is why he made the decision to enroll in the Higher Education Institute LAS MERCEDES. 

Before making this decision, one day he took a look at his surroundings and saw that life was offering him the opportunity to study and become a person filled with success and strength. Through this, he could utilize the greatest understandings, achievements, and expectations to achieve his goals for a career. 

His desire to continue moving forward with this dream is in the hands of Kiva. The decision to help him with a loan so that he might fulfill his dream is why Julio Cesar is seeking the support of Kiva.

loans.use: to pay for a semester of school.

loans.name: Julio

texts.es:
El socio Julio se sigue dedicando al negocio de servicio de taxi y tambien el socio tiene una panaderia que junto con su esposa administran,el socio trabaja en su taxi desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m,el socio por medio de estos negocio quiere salir adelante,el sueño del socio es ampliar el negocio de panaderia.El socio solicita el credito para comprar harina,mantequilla y azucar para la panaderia.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member Julio works for a taxi service and also has a bakery together with his wife. He works in his taxi from 8 am until 7 pm. Between these two businesses, Julio's dream is to expand the bakery's operations. He is asking for the loan to buy flour, butter, and sugar for the bakery. 

The member is very happy to receive this loan and promises to make his payments as agreed.

loans.use: to buy flour, butter, and sugar for the bakery.

loans.name: Elsa

texts.es:
La socia Elsa tiene 24 años es casada y tiene 1 hijo,la socia tiene un negocio de restaurant,la socia prepara diferentes platos como saltados de carne y sopas,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene varios en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de restaurant.La socia solicita el credito para comprar verduras,pollo y carne para cocinar.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Elsa is 24 years old, married, and has one son. She owns a restaurant business and prepares various dishes such as "saltado de carne" [beef strips sauteed with vegetables], and soups. She works from 8:00 in the morning until 7:00 in the evening. She has many in this business and it is going well for her. Her dream is to expand her restaurant business. She is requesting this loan to buy vegetables, chicken, and meat to cook. She is happy for the loan and promises to make her payments.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, chicken, and meat to cook.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
La socia Juana se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de comida,la socia prepara diferentes platos como saltados de carne y sopas,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 4 añso en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es tener un restaurant.La socia solicita el credito para comprar arroz,pollo,carne y verduras para preparar la comida.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The partner Juana continues earning a living through her business selling food. She makes different dishes, such as saltados de carne (a traditional Peruvian beef dish) and soups.

She works from 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. She has worked in this business for four years and it is going very well. Her dream is to have a restaurant.

She is asking for a loan to buy rice, chicken, beef and vegetables to make the food.

She is happy for the loan and promises to meet her quota payments.

loans.use: to buy rice, chicken, beef and vegetables to make food.

loans.name: Imelda

texts.en: Imelda and her spouse are farmers. They live at Alcala with their children. She is patient in monitoring their hectare of farmland for her rice crop production. They have been in rice farming for over 20 years and became knowledgeable in giving enough sustenance to their crops. This time, Imelda experienced a shortage of capital so she's requesting a loan of PHP 25,000 to buy fertilizers and pesticides to use for her farming. She believes that these farm inputs will contribute well towards the progress of her crop production and her income.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pesticides for farming

loans.name: Raad

texts.en: Raad is 19 years old. He lives in a sector in Jordan called Wihdat. Raad is currently studying for his Bachelor's degree majoring in Finance. He is in his second year. He is planning to find a better job after his graduation and to earn a better income in order to support his family. But because of the financial crisis his family has been facing, he wasn't able to pay for his upcoming semester fees. For this reason, he has applied for this loan.

loans.use: To pay for his upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy Liquefied Petroleum Gas Packages (LPG) and sell to her community

loans.name: Herlin Noe

texts.es: Herlin, tiene 21 años de edad, esta soltero, vive con sus padres en una aldea que pertenece a la comunidad de Nueva Frontera, Santa Bárbara. Con su padre se ha dedicado a la agricultura cultivando maíz y frijol, lleva 5 años de tener su propio cultivo de café el cual vende en grano en la misma zona. Ha solicitado otro préstamo por 5,000 Lempiras siendo el segundo ciclo, con el cual va comprar fertilizantes para darle asistencia a su finca de café. Su plan es mejorar la producción y las utilidades para tener mejor vida con su familia.
texts.en: Herlin is 21 years old, is single, and lives with his parents in a town that belongs to the Nueva Frontera, Santa Bárbara community. With his father, he has worked as a corn and bean farmer. He has worked for 5 years growing his own coffee plants and sells the grounds in the same district. He has asked for another loan of 5,000 HNL to buy fertilizer to work on his coffee farm. His plan is to improve production and utilities to have a better life with his family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer to maintain his coffee farm.

loans.name: Kpang Manga-Nyong Gumah Group

texts.en: Zabaga is married to Mumuni and is 38 years old with six children. She is a member of a shea nut processing solidarity group from Nyong-gumah in the northern region of Ghana. Zabaga is the 3rd person from the right as you face the group picture. Their group also belongs to a mother group called ‘Kpan Manga’ women's association. Zabaga has been doing this business with 4 of her colleagues in the solidarity group for the past five years. With a new loan of GHȼ 1,250, she can buy and store 20 bags of shea nuts for the processing of shea butter all year round. There are off-taker organizations and individuals who buy the shea butter that Zabaga processes.

loans.use: to buy 20 bags of shea nuts to extract shea butter.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for more efficient cooking energy from Liquefied Petroleum Gas

loans.name: James

texts.en:
James manages a service-based business providing motorcycle rental in their village to make a living. His wife works abroad to improve their living situation. He earns well from this business and has successfully repaid his previous loan used for his motorcycle rental business. 

This is not James's only means of earning as he also has a little farm of rice. He wants to improve his income and would like to acquire more plots of rice farm. 

Recently, he took a new loan to cover the cost for motorcycle maintenance and buy new tires. He wants to save some portion of his income to improve his family's living situation.

loans.use: to cover the cost for motorcycle maintenance and buy new tires

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to pay his college fees.

loans.name: Evaristo

texts.en:
Evaristo is a married man who lives in Kyotera town with his wife. He is a businessman who deals in retail and wholesale of drinks. He works seven days a week and each day he works for 16 hours. He has been in this business since 2011. He started his business in order to earn a living since he dropped out of school due to the failure of having tuition fees for his studies. He sells his goods to people around the town.

He has acquired this loan in order to purchase more stock and be able to meet the demand of his clients. His greatest hope is to expand his business and open up several other outlets on the outskirts of this town.  He faces the challenge of limited capital to stock all the desired drinks and constant price fluctuations due to competition.

He describes himself as someone who is aggressive and resilient. He hopes that with continuous financial support, he will soon be financially independent and won't have to depend on borrowing.

loans.use: To buy drinks to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for a clean and safe cooking energy from Liquefied Petroleum Gas to reduce the danger of hurting her child

loans.name: José Fernando

texts.es:
José, con 31 años de edad, es un hombre trabajador y honrado, que se ha desempeñado como mecánico automotriz desde que tenía 15 años, pues fue padre siendo un adolescente y tenía que velar por el sustento de su primer hijo; hoy en día el mayor de 3 niños a los que ha sacado adelante con esmero y mucha dedicación.
El oficio lo aprendió gracias a las enseñanzas de algunos familiares que se dedican a la misma labor y poco a poco, fue adquiriendo experiencia y ampliando sus conocimientos. Actualmente trabaja de manera independiente con un horario de 7 am a 6 pm o según el volumen de trabajo que tenga.
El crédito que solicita, será invertido en la compra de una caja de herramientas y en las adecuaciones locativas que debe realizar al local, esto le permitirá tener una mejor imagen y podrá prestar un servicio ágil y oportuno a sus clientes, teniendo todas las herramientas necesarias para su labor; así mejorará los ingresos con los cuales continuará solventando los gastos familiares.
José se caracteriza por ser un hombre con visión y muchas ganas de progresar, por eso se proyecta teniendo su negocio en un local propio, con el que pueda garantizar una estabilidad económica favorable para dar una buena educación a sus hijos y disfrutar una mejor calidad de vida junto a ellos y su esposa.
texts.en:
José is a 31-year-old, hardworking and honest man who has worked as an auto mechanic since he was 15 years old. He became a father when he was a teenager and had to ensure the livelihood of his first child. Today he has 3 children, whom with care and dedication, he has helped get ahead in life. He learned his trade thanks to the teachings of some family members who are engaged in the same work. Little by little, he acquired experience and expanded his knowledge. He currently works independently and has a schedule from 7am to 6pm according to the workload he has.

The loan request will be invested in the purchase of a box of tools and for improvements to his shop. This will allow him to have a better outlook on life, and help him provide quick and timely service to his customers. By having all the necessary tools for his work, he will grow his income which will continue to help him settle the family expenses. José is characterized as a man of vision and desire to progress, and that is why he plans to have his own local business with which he can guarantee a favorable economic stability to give a good education to his children, and enjoy a better quality of life together with his wife.

loans.use: to buy a box of tools and make improvements to his shop

loans.name: Marcos

texts.es:
Marcos  tiene 51 años de edad, soltero. El vive en su casa de habitación, ubicada en San Pablo Jocopilas, Suchitepéquez

Desde hace 10 años él se dedica a la albañilería (trabajos de construcción). El empezó su labor gracias a la experiencia y conocimiento que obtuvo su padre y amigos que se dedicaban a lo mismo. Usualmente realiza el trabajo de albañilería tanto en la comunidad donde vive como fuera de ella.
Con los ingresos que obtiene de su labor  logra sostener a su familia y ha ahorrado algunos recursos económicos con los cuales junto al préstamo que solicita piensa invertir en compra de herramientas para ejercer su labor con mayor facilidad y  calidad.

Marcos sueña con tener su propia empresa constructora para brindar un servicio de mejor calidad y con ello incrementar sus ingresos que lo ayuden a mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Marcos sueña con tener su propia empresa constructora para brindar un servicio de mejor calidad y con ello incrementar sus ingresos que lo ayuden a mejorar su calidad de vida.

Marcos is 51 years old and single.  He lives in a house located in San Pablo Jocopilas, Suchitepéquez. He has worked in masonry (construction work) for ten years.  He started his work thanks to the experience and knowledge of his father and friends that are engaged in the same work.  Usually, he does his masonry work both in the community where he lives and outside of it.

With the income he earns from his labor, he manages to support his family. He has saved some money and he will add these funds to the loan he is requesting to purchase tools to perform his work more easily and with quality.

Marcos dreams of having his own construction business in order to provide better quality services and, with it, increase his income, which will help him improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase tools.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for tuition for a 2-month call center training program that can get him a job paying about $270 monthly

loans.name: Fikrat

texts.en: Fikrat is 38 years old, married and has two children. His family lives in the Baku region. His elder child is 10 years old and is in fourth class at school. The younger child is going to second class of school. His wife is a housewife and Fikrat is an electrician. A while ago his apparatus was broken and for a time he has been unable to work. He applied to Komak Company for a loan in amount of 1700AZN (Azerbaijan New Manat). With this loan he wants to repair his apparatus and will be to continue his work. Also he wants to buy materials which are useful for his business. He says thank you to Kiva for the aid. Fikrat wants to recruit an assistant in the future.

loans.use: to repair his apparatus and to buy materials

loans.name: Omran Group

texts.en:
Normin is the featured borrower of the Omran group, which consists of three ladies of different nationalities who decided to hold each other's hands and acquire a loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua to start their own businesses and improve their living conditions.

Normin is a Syrian refugee. She is a 29-year-old married mother of one child who used to run her own beauty salon in her hometown in Syria, but today she is employed in a coffee factory where she is in charge of the finances and controls production and expiry dates.

Normin wants to develop her family's living conditions and make sure that she can provide them with the necessary needs. She likes having her own business and she is looking forward to establishing it again and developing her skills.

Normin is acquiring a loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua to start her own business to improve her family's living conditions since she used to have her own beauty salon in her hometown in Syria before she ran away because of the war that's taking place there now.

Normin is the first lady on the left.  As for the other group members, Wafaa is the lady at the center of the picture. She is a Palestinian refugee. Alia is the beautiful older lady on the right. She has a Lebanese nationality.

loans.use: to open a beauty salon

loans.name: Michael

texts.en:
Michael is very thankful for the financial assistance extended to him. He is using his loan in his business and his business is continuously growing. From his loan, he was able to buy the needed items for his salon. There are some challenges that he is facing in his business but he is always finding ways to overcome them. He is a hardworking person whose desire is to help not just his family but even others. 

Michael would like to apply for another 20,000 PHP (Philippine Pesos) loan which he will use to buy more products like hair straightening gel, scissors, shampoo, hair hot oil, etc. for his business. His profits from his business will definitely help him to sustain his family's daily needs. He looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in his heart. 

Michael dreams to expand his business and hopes to have a good life. He meets up with his co-fellowship* members to share stories of his work every week and where he can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God he studies. 

* All CCT (Center for Community Transformation Credit Cooperative) community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for products like hair straightening gel, scissors, shampoo, hair hot oil, etc.

loans.name: Kinanu

texts.en:
Kinanu is a well established farmer living in the Nkubu area of Eastern Kenya. She is married and has two children, both of whom are of school going age. 

Kinanu has half an acre of land where she rears cows and poultry, and grows tea, fruits and vegetables. She also has a retail business as an extra source of income. She enjoys the good returns she gets out of farming, but the challenge she faces is insufficient rain and animal diseases.

Kinanu chose Juhudi Kilimo to finance her to buy water pipes for pulling water from the river for use by her animals and for irrigating her crops. From the training she learnt that Juhudi Kilimo targets small scale farmers who have been isolated by other micro-finance institutions. This loan will bring in more income which will help her to pay her children's school fees and improve their living standards.

loans.use: For purchasing water pipes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more rice, pepper, oil, etc. for her business.

loans.use: to pay for tuition for a 2-month call center training program that can get her a job paying about $270 monthly

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more rice, pepper, Vita, oil, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy additional goods which she sells.
